</Frame>

### Edit the documentation

In the web editor, you can navigate through your documentation files in the sidebar. Let's update the introduction page:

Find and select `index.mdx` in the file explorer.

Then, in the editor, update the title field to "Hello World".

<Frame>
  <img alt="Editing in Web Editor" src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/web-editor-editing-light.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=7c08fe7c24e86a7d04877356f77c0827" className="block dark:hidden" data-og-width="3022" width="3022" data-og-height="1130" height="1130" data-path="images/quickstart/web-editor-editing-light.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/web-editor-editing-light.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=4ef74c58f6fece6b48805fd248d3ecda 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/web-editor-editing-light.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=d6ace5985d883afff1ddde6c9866421e 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/web-editor-editing-light.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=407d2dd8e6790379e20e153bede9c35f 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/web-editor-editing-light.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=5ca24e1cc2cadd07978efaa7342c9d76 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/web-editor-editing-light.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=c009f858375ee04b87c933fc5ede03fd 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/web-editor-editing-light.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=975f618ead0f7a40503fc37fe360a2a3 2500w" />

  <img alt="Editing in Web Editor" src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/web-editor-editing-dark.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=eb96c40e3c3c5856d26ff09aaf4a63d7" className="hidden dark:block" data-og-width="3018" width="3018" data-og-height="1127" height="1127" data-path="images/quickstart/web-editor-editing-dark.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/web-editor-editing-dark.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=f2fccb9a963c412feb0b476f0cad0f05 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/web-editor-editing-dark.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=680fc8eb08ebde5ffab0d1635693edd1 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/web-editor-editing-dark.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=7e0e88053d9a113b493cb708d3a11820 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/web-editor-editing-dark.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=f1ea46ef0c01dbce5daa76b2d5734ee8 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/web-editor-editing-dark.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=0f9dacad8c73b00530f4558c3c777f05 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/web-editor-editing-dark.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=77a49388c21a746e944369efca31f7e2 2500w" />
</Frame>

<Tip>
  The editor provides a rich set of formatting tools and components. Type <kbd>/</kbd> in the editor to open the command menu and access these tools.
</Tip>

### Publish your changes

When you're satisfied with your edits, select the **Publish** button in the top-right corner. Your changes are immediately deployed to your documentation site.

<Tip>
  Use branches to preview and review changes through pull requests before deploying to your live site.
</Tip>

For more details about using the web editor, including using branches and pull requests to collaborate and preview changes, see our [web editor documentation](/editor).

## Adding a custom domain

While your `<your-project-name>.mintlify.app` subdomain works well for testing and development, most teams prefer using a custom domain for production documentation.

To add a custom domain, navigate to the [Domain Setup](https://dashboard.mintlify.com/settings/deployment/custom-domain) page in your dashboard.

<Frame>
  <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/custom-domain-light.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=a19fa67c40f3287a5784a94c3a77c5c7" alt="Custom Domain" className="block dark:hidden" data-og-width="3024" width="3024" data-og-height="1142" height="1142" data-path="images/quickstart/custom-domain-light.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/custom-domain-light.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=9ba1c635a282a82825cd3d7320c30893 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/custom-domain-light.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=0338af3cb51b11a95c4ba62ca78c9c51 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/custom-domain-light.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=8461766c17fe8ef0ba3704aafe909fb0 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/custom-domain-light.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=7567dfd8d969b10b7376e6e4fa40fd14 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/custom-domain-light.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=58710f7929e187feecfb99f501a59202 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/custom-domain-light.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=5bbd1aafc46970b62225a22d29439965 2500w" />

  <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/custom-domain-dark.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=33dba15def68d2b5f9418e51dab96524" alt="Custom Domain" className="hidden dark:block" data-og-width="3018" width="3018" data-og-height="1140" height="1140" data-path="images/quickstart/custom-domain-dark.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/custom-domain-dark.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=7f2bd62f3f010863537957618c2a932a 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/custom-domain-dark.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=976e27bba60a6f0ec0549b4c62a6f4bf 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/custom-domain-dark.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=ebdb192bb06c40ae1e3f38383060ae58 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/custom-domain-dark.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=eef57948b8cc592d98adecc26518076d 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/custom-domain-dark.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=25160b72bbcb414fcdb3c2c2f61be5a5 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/quickstart/custom-domain-dark.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=520d875af30b066ad75a8e642f545061 2500w" />
</Frame>

Enter your domain (for example, `docs.yourcompany.com`) and follow the provided instructions to configure DNS settings with your domain provider.

<Table>
  | Record Type | Name                | Value                | TTL  |
  | ----------- | ------------------- | -------------------- | ---- |
  | CNAME       | docs (or subdomain) | cname.vercel-dns.com | 3600 |
</Table>

<Info>
  DNS changes can take up to 48 hours to propagate, though changes often complete much sooner.
</Info>

## Next steps

Congratulations! You have successfully deployed your documentation site with Mintlify. Here are suggested next steps to enhance your documentation:

<Card title="Configure your global settings" icon="settings" href="organize/settings" horizontal>
  Configure site-wide styling, navigation, integrations, and more with the `docs.json` file.
</Card>

<Card title="Customize your theme" icon="paintbrush" href="customize/themes" horizontal>
  Learn how to customize colors, fonts, and the overall appearance of your documentation site.
</Card>

<Card title="Organize navigation" icon="map" href="organize/navigation" horizontal>
  Structure your documentation with intuitive navigation to help users find what they need.
</Card>

<Card title="Add interactive components" icon="puzzle" href="/components/accordions" horizontal>
  Enhance your documentation with interactive components like accordions, tabs, and code samples.
</Card>

<Card title="Set up API references" icon="code" href="/api-playground/overview" horizontal>
  Create interactive API references with OpenAPI and AsyncAPI specifications.
</Card>

## Troubleshooting

If you encounter issues during the setup process, check these common troubleshooting solutions:

<AccordionGroup>
  <Accordion title="Local preview not working">
    Make sure you have Node.js v19+ installed and that you run the `mint dev` command from the directory containing your `docs.json` file.
  </Accordion>

  <Accordion title="Changes not reflecting on live site">
    Deployment can take upwards to a few minutes. Check your GitHub Actions (for code-based workflow) or deployment logs in the Mintlify dashboard to ensure there are no build errors.
  </Accordion>

  <Accordion title="Custom domain not connecting">
    Verify that your DNS records are set up correctly and allow sufficient time for DNS propagation (up to 48 hours). You can use tools like [DNSChecker](https://dnschecker.org) to verify your CNAME record.
  </Accordion>
</AccordionGroup>

  ##

 AI 

 `@mintlify Improve the onboarding page` 



* `@mintlify A lot of users have trouble installing the CLI. Review the onboarding page and update the docs so that users can easily install the CLI`
* `@mintlify Developers keep getting 401 errors when following our authentication guide. Review the auth docs and add clearer examples showing how to properly format the API key`



* `@mintlify Find and fix all typos in the docs`
* `@mintlify change all unordered lists to use * instead of -`

<div id="specify-a-subdomain">
  ## 
</div>

 `subdomain` 

 `@mintlify subdomain=<your-subdomain> <your-prompt>` 



* `@mintlify subdomain=public-docs Add a new section to the quickstart about inviting collaborators based on this PR` `public-docs`  quickstart  PR 
* `@mintlify subdomain=customer-docs Update the auth docs for the new authentication method` `customer-docs` auth

export const PreviewButton = ({children, href}) => {
  return <a href={href} className="text-sm font-medium text-white dark:!text-zinc-950 bg-zinc-900 hover:bg-zinc-700 dark:bg-zinc-100 hover:dark:bg-zinc-300 rounded-full px-3.5 py-1.5 not-prose">
        {children}
      </a>;
};

 AI  AI  AI  context ChatGPTClaudePerplexity context

<div id="menu-options">
  ## 
</div>



|                    |           |                                   |
| :------------------- | :----------- | :---------------------------------- |
| ****             | `copy`       |  Markdown AI  |
| ** Markdown **    | `view`       |  Markdown                    |
| ** ChatGPT **    | `chatgpt`    |  ChatGPT               |
| ** Claude **     | `claude`     |  Claude                |
| ** Perplexity ** | `perplexity` |  Perplexity            |
| ** MCP  URL**   | `mcp`        |  MCP  URL               |
| ** Cursor**       | `cursor`     |  Cursor  MCP             |
| ** VS Code**      | `vscode`     |  VS Code  MCP            |

  <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/contextual-menu/contextual-menu.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=79436694224db1df9d971c169aab7309" alt=" Markdown  ChatGPT  Claude " data-og-width="1396" width="1396" data-og-height="944" height="944" data-path="images/contextual-menu/contextual-menu.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/contextual-menu/contextual-menu.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=023995e9ad762ac24fb203aefdf7ec61 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/contextual-menu/contextual-menu.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=17ce98f03df746c0e49d7ad0a4475c89 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/contextual-menu/contextual-menu.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=825e6fe3e0dcaff289ab5d6a41af79f0 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/contextual-menu/contextual-menu.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=47584c00e08a958c19e4bd2986388d0f 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/contextual-menu/contextual-menu.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=2a617bc92f27e1907f826df9f1ad510e 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai/images/contextual-menu/contextual-menu.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=Khh2tU2DRm-hiGai&q=85&s=f27964b2e6d75e5ceb9a7c41b710f624 2500w" />

<div id="enabling-the-contextual-menu">
  ## 
</div>

 `docs.json`  `contextual` 

```json  theme={null}
{
 "contextual": {
   "options": [
     "copy",
     "view",
     "chatgpt",
     "claude",
     "perplexity",
     "mcp",
     "cursor",
     "vscode"
   ]
 }
}
```

<div id="adding-custom-options">
  ## 
</div>

 `options` 

<ResponseField name="title" type="string" required>
  
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="description" type="string" required>
  
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="icon" type="string" required>
   icon

  

  * [Font Awesome icon](https://fontawesome.com/icons) 
  * [Lucide icon](https://lucide.dev/icons) 
  *  JSX  SVG 
  *  icon  URL
  *  icon 

   SVG 

  1.  [SVGR converter](https://react-svgr.com/playground/)  SVG 
  2.  SVG  SVG 
  3.  JSX  `<svg>...</svg>` 
  4.  JSX  SVG `icon={<svg ...> ... </svg>}`
  5.  `height`  `width`
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="iconType" type="string">
  [Font Awesome](https://fontawesome.com/icons)  icon  Font Awesome 

  `regular``solid``light``thin``sharp-solid``duotone``brands`
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="href" type="string | object" required>
   href query 

  <Expandable title="href object">
    <ResponseField name="base" type="string" required>
       URL
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="query" type="object" required>
       query 

      <Expandable title="query object">
        <ResponseField name="key" type="string" required>
          query  key
        </ResponseField>

        <ResponseField name="value" type="string" required>
          query 

          *  `$page` Markdown 
          *  `$path` 
          *  `$mcp`  MCP  URL
        </ResponseField>
      </Expandable>
    </ResponseField>
  </Expandable>
</ResponseField>



```json {9-14} wrap theme={null}
{
    "contextual": {
        "options": [
            "copy",
            "view",
            "chatgpt",
            "claude",
            "perplexity",
            {
                "title": "",
                "description": " GitHub ",
                "icon": "plus",
                "href": "https://github.com/orgs/mintlify/discussions/categories/feature-requests"
            }
        ]
    }
}
```

<div id="custom-option-examples">
  ### 
</div>

<AccordionGroup>
  <Accordion title="">
    ```json  theme={null}
    {
      "title": "",
      "description": " GitHub ",
      "icon": "plus",
      "href": "https://github.com/orgs/mintlify/discussions/categories/feature-requests"
    }
    ```
  </Accordion>

  <Accordion title="">
    ```json  theme={null}
    {
      "title": " X ",
      "description": " X",
      "icon": "x",
      "href": {
        "base": "https://x.com/intent/tweet",
        "query": [
          {
          "key": "text",
          "value": "$page"
          }
        ]
      }
    }
    ```
  </Accordion>
</AccordionGroup>


# llms.txt
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/ai/llmstxt



export const PreviewButton = ({children, href}) => {
  return <a href={href} className="text-sm font-medium text-white dark:!text-zinc-950 bg-zinc-900 hover:bg-zinc-700 dark:bg-zinc-100 hover:dark:bg-zinc-300 rounded-full px-3.5 py-1.5 not-prose">
        {children}
      </a>;
};

[llms.txt ](https://llmstxt.org)  LLM AI 

Mintlify  `llms.txt`  `llms.txt` 

 URL  `/llms.txt`  `llms.txt`

<PreviewButton href="https://mintlify.com/docs/llms.txt"> llms.txt</PreviewButton>

<div id="llmstxt-structure">
  ## llms.txt 
</div>

`llms.txt`  Markdown 

*  H1 ****
* ****



 frontmatter  `description`  `description`  `llms.txt` 

```mdx Example llms.txt theme={null}
# 

## 

- [API](https://example.com/docs/api): 
- [](https://example.com/docs/install): 
- [](https://example.com/docs/start): 
```

 LLM  AI 

<div id="llms-fulltxt">
  ## llms-full.txt
</div>

`llms-full.txt`  AI  context  LLM 

Mintlify  `llms-full.txt`  URL  `/llms-full.txt` 

<PreviewButton href="https://mintlify.com/docs/llms-full.txt"> llms-full.txt</PreviewButton>

<div id="custom-files">
  ## 
</div>

 `llms.txt`  `llms-full.txt` 

 `llms.txt`  `llms-full.txt`  H1  `llms.txt` [Format](https://llmstxt.org/#format)

export const PreviewButton = ({children, href}) => {
  return <a href={href} className="text-sm font-medium text-white dark:!text-zinc-950 bg-zinc-900 hover:bg-zinc-700 dark:bg-zinc-100 hover:dark:bg-zinc-300 rounded-full px-3.5 py-1.5 not-prose">
        {children}
      </a>;
};

<div id="configuring-your-mcp-server">
  ##  MCP 
</div>

 MCP  `search` 

 [Pro  Enterprise ](https://mintlify.com/pricing?ref=mcp) OpenAPI  MCP 

 MCP  `x-mint`  `mcp` Mintlify MCP  AI 

MCP API  MCP  AI 

<ResponseField name="mcp" type="object">
   MCP 

  <Expandable title="MCP">
    <ResponseField name="enabled" type="boolean">
       MCP 
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="name" type="string">
      MCP 
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="description" type="string">
      MCP 
    </ResponseField>
  </Expandable>
</ResponseField>

<div id="file-level-configuration">
  ### 
</div>

 OpenAPI  MCP

```json  theme={null}
{
  "openapi": "3.1.0",
  "x-mint": {
    "mcp": {
      "enabled": true
    }
  },
  // ...
  "paths": {
    "/api/v1/users": {
      "get": {
        "x-mint": {
          "mcp": {
            "enabled": false //  MCP
          }
        },
        // ...
      }
    }
  }
}
```

<div id="endpoint-level-configuration">
  ### 
</div>

 Model Context ProtocolMCP

```json  theme={null}
{
  "paths": {
    "/api/v1/users": {
      "get": {
        "x-mint": {
          "mcp": {
            "enabled": true,
            "name": "get-users",
            "description": ""
          },
          // ...
        }
      }
    },
    "/api/v1/delete": {
      "delete": {
        //  `x-mint: mcp` MCP 
        // ...
      }
    }
  }
}
```

 MCP 

<Tabs>
  <Tab title="Contextual menu">
    [](/zh/ai/contextual-menu) MCP 

    |                  |       |                          |
    | :----------------- | :------- | :------------------------- |
    | ** MCP  URL** | `mcp`    |  MCP  URL  |
    | ** Cursor**     | `cursor` |  Cursor  MCP     |
    | ** VS Code**    | `vscode` |  VS Code  MCP    |
  </Tab>

  <Tab title="Claude">
    <Steps>
      <Step title=" MCP  URL">
        [](https://dashboard.mintlify.com/products/mcp) MCP  URL
      </Step>

      <Step title=" MCP  URL">
         MCP  URL  Claude 

        1.  Claude  [Connectors](https://claude.ai/settings/connectors) 
        2.  **Add custom connector**
        3.  MCP  URL
        4.  **Add**
        5.  Claude 
        6.  MCP 
      </Step>
    </Steps>

     [Model Context Protocol ](https://modelcontextprotocol.io/docs/tutorials/use-remote-mcp-server#connecting-to-a-remote-mcp-server)
  </Tab>

  <Tab title="Claude Code">
    <Steps>
      <Step title=" MCP  URL">
        [](https://dashboard.mintlify.com/products/mcp) MCP  URL
      </Step>

      <Step title=" MCP  URL">
         MCP  URL  Claude Code 

        ```bash  theme={null}
        claude mcp add --transport http <name> <url>
        ```
      </Step>
    </Steps>

     [Claude Code ](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/claude-code/mcp#installing-mcp-servers)
  </Tab>

  <Tab title="Cursor">
    <Steps>
      <Step title=" MCP  URL">
        [](https://dashboard.mintlify.com/products/mcp) MCP  URL
      </Step>

      <Step title=" MCP  URL">
         MCP  URL  Cursor 

        1.  <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>P</kbd>Windows  <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>P</kbd>
        2.  "Open MCP settings"
        3.  **Add custom MCP** `mcp.json` 
        4.  `mcp.json` 

        ```json  theme={null}
        {
          "mcpServers": {
            "<your-mcp-server-name>": {
              "url": "<your-mcp-server-url>"
            }
          }
        }
        ```
      </Step>
    </Steps>

     [Cursor ](https://docs.cursor.com/en/context/mcp#installing-mcp-servers)
  </Tab>

  <Tab title="VS Code">
    <Steps>
      <Step title=" MCP  URL">
        [](https://dashboard.mintlify.com/products/mcp) MCP  URL
      </Step>

      <Step title=" MCP  URL">
         MCP  URL  VS Code 

        1.  `.vscode/mcp.json` 
        2.  `mcp.json` 

        ```json  theme={null}
        {
          "servers": {
            "<your-mcp-server-name>": {
              "type": "http",
              "url": "<your-mcp-server-url>"
            }
          }
        }
        ```
      </Step>
    </Steps>

     [VS Code ](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/chat/mcp-servers)
  </Tab>
</Tabs>

#  SDK 
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/api-playground/adding-sdk-examples

 API  SDK

 SDK  API  `x-codeSamples`  OpenAPI  OpenAPI 



<ParamField body="lang" type="string" required>
  
</ParamField>

<ParamField body="label" type="string">
  
</ParamField>

<ParamField body="source" type="string" required>
  
</ParamField>

 Bash CLI JavaScript SDK

```yaml  theme={null}
paths:
  /plants:
    get:
      # ...
      x-codeSamples:
        - lang: bash
          label: 
          source: |
            planter list -u
        - lang: javascript
          label: 
          source: |
            const planter = require('planter');
            planter.list({ unwatered: true });
        - lang: bash
          label: 
          source: |
            planter list -p
        - lang: javascript
          label: 
          source: |
            const planter = require('planter');
            planter.list({ potted: true });
```

# AsyncAPI 
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/api-playground/asyncapi/setup

<div id="add-an-asyncapi-specification-file">
  ##  AsyncAPI 
</div>

 WebSocket  [AsyncAPI ](https://www.asyncapi.com/docs/reference/specification/v3.0.0)  AsyncAPI  JSON  YAML AsyncAPI 3.0+ 

<Tip>
   AsyncAPI 
  [AsyncAPI Studio](https://studio.asyncapi.com/)
</Tip>

<div id="auto-populate-websockets-pages">
  ##  WebSocket 
</div>

 `docs.json`  navigation  Tab  group  `asyncapi`  AsyncAPI  AsyncAPI  URL AsyncAPI Mintlify  AsyncAPI WebSocket 

** Tabs **

<CodeGroup>
  ```json Local File {5} theme={null}
  "navigation": {
    "tabs": [
      {
          "tab": "API Reference",
          "asyncapi": "/path/to/asyncapi.json"
      }
    ]
  }

  ```

  ```json Remote URL {5} theme={null}
  "navigation": {
    "tabs": [
      {
          "tab": "API Reference",
          "asyncapi": "https://github.com/asyncapi/spec/blob/master/examples/simple-asyncapi.yml"
      }
    ]
  }
  ```
</CodeGroup>

** Groups **

```json {8-11} theme={null}
"navigation": {
  "tabs": [
    {
      "tab": "AsyncAPI",
      "groups": [
        {
          "group": "Websockets",
          "asyncapi": {
            "source": "/path/to/asyncapi.json",
            "directory": "api-reference"
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```

<Note>
  directory  docs  **api-reference** 
</Note>

<div id="channel-page">
  ## Channel 
</div>

 frontmatter  `asyncapi`  MDX 

```mdx  theme={null}
---
title: "Websocket "
asyncapi: "/path/to/asyncapi.json channelName"
---
```


# 
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/api-playground/complex-data-types

 `oneOf``anyOf`  `allOf`  API

 API OpenAPI  `oneOf``anyOf`  `allOf` API

<div id="oneof-anyof-allof-keywords">
  ## `oneOf`, `anyOf`, `allOf` 
</div>

OpenAPI  schema 

* `allOf` schema  schema `and` 
* `anyOf` schema  `or` 
* `oneOf` schema  `exclusive-or` 

<Warning>Mintlify  `oneOf`  `anyOf`  API </Warning>

 [OpenAPI ](https://swagger.io/docs/specification/data-models/oneof-anyof-allof-not/)

<Info>`not` </Info>

<div id="combining-schemas-with-allof">
  ###  `allOf` schema
</div>

 `allOf` Mintlify  OpenAPI  `allOf` schemaMintlify  OpenAPI [](https://swagger.io/docs/specification/components/)

```yaml  theme={null}
org_with_users:
  allOf:
    - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Org'
    - type: object
      properties:
        users:
          type: array
          description: 
# ...
components:
  schemas:
    Org:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          description:  ID
```

<ParamField body="org_with_users" type="object">
  <Expandable>
    <ParamField body="id" type="string">
       ID
    </ParamField>

    <ParamField body="users" type="object[]">
      
    </ParamField>
  </Expandable>
</ParamField>

<div id="providing-options-with-oneof-and-anyof">
  ###  `oneOf`  `anyOf` 
</div>

 `oneOf`  `anyOf`  `title` 

```yaml  theme={null}
delivery_address:
  oneOf:
    - title: StreetAddress
      type: object
      properties:
        address_line_1:
          type: string
          description: 
        # ...
    - title: POBox
      type: object
      properties:
        box_number:
          type: string
          description: 
        # ...
```

<ParamField body="delivery_address" type="object">
  <div className="mt-4 rounded-xl border border-gray-100 px-4 pb-4 pt-2 dark:border-white/10">
    <Tabs>
      <Tab title="StreetAddress">
        <ParamField body="address_line_1" type="string">
          
        </ParamField>
      </Tab>

      <Tab title="POBox">
        <ParamField body="box_number" type="string">
          
        </ParamField>
      </Tab>
    </Tabs>
  </div>
</ParamField>


# 
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/api-playground/managing-page-visibility

 OpenAPI 

 OpenAPI  URL 

 OpenAPI  `x-hidden`  `x-excluded` 

<div id="x-hidden">
  ## `x-hidden`
</div>

`x-hidden`  URL 

`x-hidden` 

* 
* 
* 

<div id="x-excluded">
  ## `x-excluded`
</div>

`x-excluded` 

`x-excluded` 

* 
* 
*  Beta 

<div id="implementation">
  ## 
</div>

 OpenAPI  HTTP  `x-hidden`  `x-excluded` 

 OpenAPI  webhook 

```json {11, 19} theme={null}
"paths": {
  "/plants": {
    "get": {
      "description": "",
      "parameters": { /*...*/ },
      "responses": { /*...*/ }
    }
  },
  "/hidden_plants": {
    "get": {
      "x-hidden": true,
      "description": "",
      "parameters": { /*...*/ },
      "responses": { /*...*/ }
    }
  },
  "/secret_plants": {
    "get": {
      "x-excluded": true,
      "description": "",
      "parameters": { /*...*/ },
      "responses": { /*...*/ }
    }
  }
},
```

```json {9, 15} theme={null}
"webhooks": {
  "/plants_hook": {
    "post": {
      "description": " Webhook ",
    }
  },
  "/hidden_plants_hook": {
    "post": {
      "x-hidden": true,
      "description": " Webhook"
    }
  },
  "/secret_plants_hook": {
    "post": {
      "x-excluded": true,
      "description": " Webhook"
    }
  }
}
```


# 
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/api-playground/mdx/authentication

 API key

<div id="enabling-authentication">
  ## 
</div>

 `docs.json` 



<div id="bearer-token">
  ### Bearer 
</div>

<CodeGroup>
  ```json docs.json theme={null}
  "api": {
      "mdx": {
        "auth": {
          "method": "bearer"
        }
      }
  }
  ```

  ```mdx Page Metadata theme={null}
  ---
  title: "Your page title"
  authMethod: "bearer"
  ---
  ```
</CodeGroup>

<div id="basic-authentication">
  ### 
</div>

<CodeGroup>
  ```json docs.json theme={null}
  "api": {
      "mdx": {
        "auth": {
          "method": "basic"
        }
      }
  }
  ```

  ```mdx Page Metadata theme={null}
  ---
  title: "Your page title"
  authMethod: "basic"
  ---
  ```
</CodeGroup>

<div id="api-key">
  ### API key
</div>

<CodeGroup>
  ```json docs.json theme={null}
  "api": {
      "mdx": {
        "auth": {
          "method": "key",
          "name": "x-api-key"
        }
      }
  }
  ```

  ```mdx Page Metadata theme={null}
  ---
  title: "Your page title"
  authMethod: "key"
  ---
  ```
</CodeGroup>

<div id="none">
  ### 
</div>

 docs.json  none 

<CodeGroup>
  ```mdx Page Metadata theme={null}
  ---
  title: "Your page title"
  authMethod: "none"
  ---
  ```
</CodeGroup>


# MDX 
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/api-playground/mdx/configuration

 `MDX`  API 

 `MDX`  API  OpenAPI  OpenAPI  API  API  `MDX`  API 

 `MDX`  API  `docs.json`  API  `MDX`  `<ParamFields />` Mintlify  API 

<Steps>
  <Step title="Configure your API">
     `docs.json`  URL 

    ```json  theme={null}
     "api": {
      "mdx": {
        "server": "https://mintlify.com/api", // string array for multiple base URLs
        "auth": {
          "method": "key",
          "name": "x-api-key" // options: bearer, basic, key.
        }
      }
    }
    ```

     API  `display` 

    ```json  theme={null}
    "api": {
      "playground": {
        "display": "none"
      }
    }
    ```

     [Settings](/zh/organize/settings#api-configurations)  API 
  </Step>

  <Step title="Create your endpoint pages">
     API  `MDX`  `title`  `api`

    ```mdx  theme={null}
    ---
    title: 'Create new user'
    api: 'POST https://api.mintlify.com/user'
    ---
    ```

     `{}` 

    ```bash  theme={null}
    https://api.example.com/v1/endpoint/{userId}
    ```

    <Note>
       `docs.json`  `server`  `/v1/endpoint` 
    </Note>

     frontmatter  `playground` API 

    ```mdx  theme={null}
    ---
    title: 'Create new user'
    api: 'POST https://api.mintlify.com/user'
    playground: 'none'
    ---
    ```

    * `playground: 'interactive'` - 
    * `playground: 'simple'` - 
    * `playground: 'none'` - 
  </Step>

  <Step title="Add your endpoints to your docs">
     `docs.json`  `navigation`  [Navigation](/zh/organize/navigation) 
  </Step>
</Steps>

 `docs.json`

  ```json docs.json theme={null}
  "api": {
      "mdx": {
        "auth": {
          "method": "bearer"
        }
      }
  }
  ```

  ```mdx Page Metadata theme={null}
  ---
  title: "Your page title"
  authMethod: "bearer"
  ---
  ```
</CodeGroup>

  ### 
</div>

<CodeGroup>
  ```json docs.json theme={null}
  "api": {
      "mdx": {
        "auth": {
          "method": "basic"
        }
      }
  }
  ```

  ```mdx Page Metadata theme={null}
  ---
  title: "Your page title"
  authMethod: "basic"
  ---
  ```
</CodeGroup>

  ### API 
</div>

  ```json docs.json theme={null}
  "api": {
      "mdx": {
        "auth": {
          "method": "key",
          "name": "x-api-key"
        }
      }
  }
  ```

  ```mdx Page Metadata theme={null}
  ---
  title: "Your page title"
  authMethod: "key"
  ---
  ```

# 
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/api-playground/multiple-responses



 API  context  `examples` 



```yaml  theme={null}
responses:
  "200":
    description: 
    content:
      application/json:
        schema:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/YourResponseSchema"
        examples:
          us:
            summary: 
            value:
              countryCode: "US"
              currencyCode: "USD"
              taxRate: 0.0825
          gb:
            summary: 
            value:
              countryCode: "GB"
              currencyCode: "GBP"
              taxRate: 0.20
```


# OpenAPI 
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/api-playground/openapi-setup

<div id="add-an-openapi-specification-file">
  ##  OpenAPI 
</div>

 OpenAPI  OpenAPI JSON  YAML  [OpenAPI 3.0+ ](https://swagger.io/specification/)

 OpenAPI  API 

<div id="describing-your-api">
  ###  API
</div>

 OpenAPI 

* [Swagger  OpenAPI ](https://swagger.io/docs/specification/v3_0/basic-structure/) OpenAPI 
* [OpenAPI  Markdown ](https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/blob/main/versions/) OpenAPI 
* [Swagger Editor](https://editor.swagger.io/) OpenAPI 
* [Mint CLI](https://www.npmjs.com/package/mint) OpenAPI `mint openapi-check <openapiFilenameOrUrl>`

<Note>
  Swagger  OpenAPI  OpenAPI v3.0
   v3.1 v3.0  v3.1  OpenAPI 
  [ OpenAPI 3.0  3.1.0](https://www.openapis.org/blog/2021/02/16/migrating-from-openapi-3-0-to-3-1-0)
</Note>

<div id="specifying-the-url-for-your-api">
  ###  API  URL
</div>

 Mintlify  API  OpenAPI  `servers`  API  URL

```json  theme={null}
{
  "servers": [
    {
      "url": "https://api.example.com/v1"
    }
  ]
}
```

 OpenAPI  API  `/users/{id}`  `/` URL  `servers`  OpenAPI  [API Server and Base Path](https://swagger.io/docs/specification/api-host-and-base-path/)

API  URL  URL API 

 API  URL [ servers ](https://swagger.io/docs/specification/v3_0/api-host-and-base-path/#overriding-servers)

<div id="specifying-authentication">
  ### 
</div>

 API  API  OpenAPI  `securitySchemes`  `security` API  API  OpenAPI 

<Steps>
  <Step title="Define your authentication method.">
     `securitySchemes` 

     Bearer 

    ```json  theme={null}
    {
      "components": {
        "securitySchemes": {
          "bearerAuth": {
            "type": "http",
            "scheme": "bearer"
          }
        }
      }
    }
    ```
  </Step>

  <Step title="Apply authentication to your endpoints.">
     `security` 

    ```json  theme={null}
    {
      "security": [
        {
          "bearerAuth": []
        }
      ]
    }
    ```
  </Step>
</Steps>



* [API Keys](https://swagger.io/docs/specification/authentication/api-keys/):  headerquery  cookie  key
* [Bearer](https://swagger.io/docs/specification/authentication/bearer-authentication/):  JWTJSON Web Token OAuth 
* [Basic](https://swagger.io/docs/specification/authentication/basic-authentication/): 

 API [ security ](https://swagger.io/docs/specification/authentication/#:~:text=you%20can%20apply%20them%20to%20the%20whole%20API%20or%20individual%20operations%20by%20adding%20the%20security%20section%20on%20the%20root%20level%20or%20operation%20level%2C%20respectively.)

 OpenAPI [Authentication](https://swagger.io/docs/specification/authentication/)

<div id="x-mint-extension">
  ## `x-mint` 
</div>

`x-mint`  OpenAPI  API 

<div id="metadata">
  ### 
</div>

 `x-mint: metadata` API  `openapi`  `MDX` frontmatter 

```json {7-13} theme={null}
{
  "paths": {
    "/users": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "",
        "description": "",
        "x-mint": {
          "metadata": {
            "title": "",
            "description": "",
            "og:title": ""
          }
        },
        "parameters": [
          {
            // 
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  }
}
```

<div id="content">
  ### 
</div>

 `x-mint: content`  API 

```json {6-8} theme={null}
{
  "paths": {
    "/users": {
      "post": {
        "summary": "",
        "x-mint": {
          "content": "## \n\n\n\n<Note></Note>"
        },
        "parameters": [
          {
            // 
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  }
}
```

`content`  Mintlify  MDX 

<div id="href">
  ### Href
</div>

 `x-mint: href`  URL

```json {6-8, 14-16} theme={null}
{
  "paths": {
    "/legacy-endpoint": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "",
        "x-mint": {
          "href": "/deprecated-endpoints/legacy-endpoint"
        }
      }
    },
    "/documented-elsewhere": {
      "post": {
        "summary": "",
        "x-mint": {
          "href": "/guides/special-endpoint-guide"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

 `x-mint: href`  URL API 

<div id="mcp">
  ### MCP
</div>

 `x-mint: mcp`  Model Context ProtocolMCP AI 

<ResponseField name="mcp" type="object">
   MCP 

  <Expandable title="MCP">
    <ResponseField name="enabled" type="boolean">
       MCP 
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="name" type="string">
      MCP 
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="description" type="string">
      MCP 
    </ResponseField>
  </Expandable>
</ResponseField>

<CodeGroup>
  ```json Selective enablement {6-9} wrap theme={null}
  {
    "paths": {
      "/users": {
        "post": {
          "summary": "Create user",
          "x-mint": {
            "mcp": {
              "enabled": true
            },
            // ...
          }
        }
      },
      "/users": {
        "delete": {
          "summary": "Delete user (admin only)",
          // No `x-mint: mcp` so this endpoint is not exposed as an MCP tool
          // ...
        }
      }
    }
  }
  ```

  ```json Global enablement {3-5, 9-13} wrap theme={null}
  {
    "openapi": "3.1.0",
    "x-mcp": {
        "enabled": true // All endpoints are exposed as MCP tools by default
      },
    "paths": {
      "/api/admin/delete": {
        "delete": {
          "x-mint": {
            "mcp": {
              "enabled": false // Disable MCP for this endpoint
            }
          },
          "summary": "Delete resources"
        }
      }
    }
  }
  ```
</CodeGroup>

 [Model Context Protocol](/zh/ai/model-context-protocol)

  ##  API

 `docs.json`  navigation  `openapi`  OpenAPI  API 

`openapi`  OpenAPI  URL

 metadata 

* `title` `summary`  `summary` HTTP 
* `description` `description` 
* `version` Tab  `version` 
* `deprecated` `deprecated`  `true`

   API  OpenAPI  operation 
  [x-hidden](/zh/api-playground/managing-page-visibility#x-hidden)
  
</Tip>



1.  API  navigation  OpenAPI  API 
2.  navigation 

<div id="dedicated-api-sections">
  ###  API 
</div>

 navigation  `openapi`  API 

```json {5} theme={null}
"navigation": {
  "tabs": [
    {
        "tab": "API ",
        "openapi": "https://petstore3.swagger.io/api/v3/openapi.json"
    }
  ]
}
```

 OpenAPI 

```json {8-11, 15-18} theme={null}
"navigation": {
  "tabs": [
    {
      "tab": "API ",
      "groups": [
        {
          "group": "",
          "openapi": {
            "source": "/path/to/openapi-1.json",
            "directory": "api-reference"
          }
        },
        {
          "group": "",
          "openapi": {
            "source": "/path/to/openapi-2.json",
            "directory": "api-reference"
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```

<Note>
  `directory`  API  `api-reference` 
</Note>

<div id="selective-endpoints">
  ### 
</div>

 API 

<div id="set-a-default-openapi-spec">
  ####  OpenAPI 
</div>

 OpenAPI  `pages` 

```json {12, 15-16} theme={null}
"navigation": {
  "tabs": [
    {
      "tab": "",
      "pages": [
        "quickstart",
        "installation"
      ]
    },
    {
      "tab": "API ",
      "openapi": "/path/to/openapi.json",
      "pages": [
        "api-overview",
        "GET /users",
        "POST /users",
        "guides/authentication"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```

 `METHOD /path`  OpenAPI  API 

<div id="openapi-spec-inheritance">
  #### OpenAPI 
</div>

OpenAPI  OpenAPI 

```json {3, 7-8, 11, 13-14} theme={null}
{
  "group": "API ",
  "openapi": "/path/to/openapi-v1.json",
  "pages": [
    "overview",
    "authentication",
    "GET /users",
    "POST /users",
    {
      "group": "",
      "openapi": "/path/to/openapi-v2.json",
      "pages": [
        "GET /orders",
        "POST /orders"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```

<div id="individual-endpoints">
  #### 
</div>

 OpenAPI 

```json {5-6} theme={null}
"navigation": {
  "pages": [
    "introduction",
    "user-guides",
    "/path/to/openapi-v1.json POST /users",
    "/path/to/openapi-v2.json GET /orders"
  ]
}
```



<div id="create-mdx-files-for-api-pages">
  ##  API  `MDX`

 `MDX`  metadata

 MindsDB [MDX OpenAPI ](https://github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb/blob/main/docs/rest/databases/create-databases.mdx?plain=1)[](https://docs.mindsdb.com/rest/databases/create-databases)

<div id="manually-specify-files">
  ### 
</div>

 `MDX`  frontmatter  `openapi`  OpenAPI 

 OpenAPI  API  OpenAPI 

 OpenAPI  Mintlify  OpenAPI  OpenAPI Mintlify 

<Note>
   OpenAPI 
   frontmatter  OpenAPI 
  
</Note>

 OpenAPI  URL  `docs.json` 

<CodeGroup>
  ```mdx Example theme={null}
  ---
  title: "Get users"
  description: "Returns all plants from the system that the user has access to"
  openapi: "/path/to/openapi-1.json GET /users"
  deprecated: true
  version: "1.0"
  ---
  ```

  ```mdx Format theme={null}
  ---
  title: "title of the page"
  description: "description of the page"
  openapi: openapi-file-path method path
  deprecated: boolean (not required)
  version: "version-string" (not required)
  ---
  ```
</CodeGroup>

<Note>
   OpenAPI 
   OpenAPI 
</Note>

<div id="autogenerate-mdx-files">
  ###  `MDX` 
</div>

 Mintlify [scraper](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@mintlify/scraping)  OpenAPI  `MDX` 

<Note>
   OpenAPI 
</Note>

scraper 

*  OpenAPI  `paths`  `MDX` 
*  OpenAPI  3.1+  `webhooks`  `MDX` 
*  `docs.json`  navigation 

<Steps>
  <Step title=" `MDX` ">
    ```bash  theme={null}
    npx @mintlify/scraping@latest openapi-file <path-to-openapi-file>
    ```
  </Step>

  <Step title="">
    ```bash  theme={null}
    npx @mintlify/scraping@latest openapi-file <path-to-openapi-file> -o api-reference
    ```

     `-o` 
  </Step>
</Steps>

  ```mdx  theme={null}
  ---
  openapi-schema: OrderItem
  ---
  ```

  ```mdx  theme={null}
  ---
  openapi-schema: "schema-key"
  ---
  ```
</CodeGroup>

 OpenAPI

  ```mdx  theme={null}
  ---
  openapi-schema: en-schema.json OrderItem
  ---
  ```

  ```mdx  theme={null}
  ---
  openapi-schema: "path-to-schema-file schema-key"
  ---
  ```
</CodeGroup>

<div id="getting-started">
  ## 
</div>

<Steps>
  <Step title=" OpenAPI ">
    <Info>
       [Swagger Editor](https://editor.swagger.io/)  [Mint CLI](https://www.npmjs.com/package/mint)  OpenAPI 
    </Info>

    ```bash {3} theme={null}
    /your-project
      |- docs.json
      |- openapi.json
    ```
  </Step>

  <Step title=" `docs.json`">
     `docs.json`  OpenAPI  navigation  `openapi`  OpenAPI 

     `openapi.json` API reference

    ```json  theme={null}
    "navigation": {
      "groups": [
        {
          "group": "API reference",
          "openapi": "openapi.json"
        }
      ]
    }
    ```

     navigation  `pages` 

     `GET /users`  `POST /users`  `pages` 

    ```json  theme={null}
    "navigation": {
      "groups": [
          {
            "group": "API reference",
            "openapi": "openapi.json",
            "pages": [
              "GET /users",
              "POST /users"
            ]
          }
      ]
    }
    ```
  </Step>
</Steps>

<div id="customizing-your-playground">
  ## 
</div>

 `docs.json`  API 

<ResponseField name="playground" type="object">
  API 

  <Expandable title="playground" defaultOpen="True">
    <ResponseField name="display" type="&#x22;interactive&#x22; | &#x22;simple&#x22; | &#x22;none&#x22;">
      API 

      * `"interactive"`
      * `"simple"`
      * `"none"`

       `interactive`
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="proxy" type="boolean" defaultOpen="True">
       API  `true`
    </ResponseField>
  </Expandable>
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="examples" type="object">
   API 

  <Expandable title="examples" defaultOpen="True">
    <ResponseField name="languages" type="array of string">
       API 

      
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="defaults" type="&#x22;required&#x22; | &#x22;all&#x22;">
       API  `all`
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="prefill" type="boolean">
       API  OpenAPI  `false`
    </ResponseField>
  </Expandable>
</ResponseField>

<div id="example-configuration">
  ### 
</div>

```json  theme={null}
{
 "api": {
   "playground": {
     "display": "interactive"
   },
   "examples": {
     "languages": ["curl", "python", "javascript"],
     "defaults": "required",
     "prefill": true
   }
 }
}
```

 API  cURLPython  JavaScript

*  playground

     metadata  `openapi` 
    HTTP  OpenAPI  HTTP 

    

    ```mdx get-user.mdx theme={null}

    ```

    ```yaml openapi.yaml theme={null}

      "/users/{id}":
        get: ...
    ```

    `openapi`  OpenAPI 

     `openapi`  OpenAPI  OpenAPI  `openapi/v1.json`  `openapi/v2.json` metadata 

    ```mdx api-reference/v1/users/get-user.mdx theme={null}
    ---
    openapi: "v1 GET /users/{id}"
    ---
    ```
  </Accordion>

  </Accordion>

    ```json {5} theme={null}
          "group": "API ",

            "GET /users",
            "POST /users"
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
    ```

# Create agent job
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/api/agent/create-agent-job

POST /agent/{projectId}/job
Creates a new agent job that can generate and edit documentation based on provided messages and branch information.

 branch

# Get update status
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/api/update/status

GET /project/update-status/{statusId}
Get the status of an update from the status ID



# Trigger update
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/api/update/trigger

POST /project/update/{projectId}
Queue a deployment update for your documentation project. Returns a status ID that can be used to track the update progress. By default, the update is triggered from your configured deployment branch.

  ```java HelloWorld.java theme={null}
  }
  ```

  ```json Maintenance notices wrap theme={null}
    "dismissible": false
  }
  ```

  ```json Required actions wrap theme={null}
  }
  ```

<div id="properties">

<ResponseField name="icon" type="string" required>
   icon

  

  * [Font Awesome icon](https://fontawesome.com/icons) 
  * [Lucide icon](https://lucide.dev/icons) 
  *  JSX  SVG 
  *  icon  URL
  *  icon 

   SVG 

  1.  [SVGR converter](https://react-svgr.com/playground/)  SVG 
  2.  SVG  SVG 
  3.  JSX  `<svg>...</svg>` 
  4.  JSX  SVG `icon={<svg ...> ... </svg>}`
  5.  `height`  `width`
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="iconType" type="string">
  [Font Awesome](https://fontawesome.com/icons)  icon  Font Awesome 

  `regular``solid``light``thin``sharp-solid``duotone``brands`
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="color" type="string">
  icon  `#FF5733`
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="size" type="number">
  icon 
</ResponseField>


# Mermaid
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/components/mermaid-diagrams

 Mermaid 

[Mermaid](https://mermaid.js.org/) 

 [Mermaid ](https://mermaid.js.org/intro/)

```mermaid  theme={null}
  flowchart LR
    subgraph subgraph1
        direction TB
        top1[top] --> bottom1[bottom]
    end
    subgraph subgraph2
        direction TB
        top2[top] --> bottom2[bottom]
    end
    %% ^ 

    %% ** subgraph1subgraph1 
    outside --> subgraph1
    %% ** subgraph2 **
    %% subgraph2  (LR)
    outside ---> top2
```

````mdx Mermaid flowchart example theme={null}
```mermaid
  flowchart LR
    subgraph subgraph1
        direction TB
        top1[] --> bottom1[]
    end
    subgraph subgraph2
        direction TB
        top2[] --> bottom2[]
    end
    %% ^ 

    %% ** subgraph1subgraph1 
    outside --> subgraph1
    %% ** subgraph2 **
    %% subgraph2  (LR)
    outside ---> top2
```
````

<div id="syntax">
  ## 
</div>

 Mermaid  Mermaid 

````mdx  theme={null}
```mermaid
//  mermaid 
```
````

<div id="redirects">
  ## 
</div>

 `docs.json`  `redirects`  301 

```json  theme={null}
"redirects": [
  {
    "source": "/source/path",
    "destination": "/destination/path"
  }
]
```

 `/source/path`  `/destination/path` SEO

 `*``/beta/:slug*`  `/beta/introduction`  `/v2/introduction`

```json  theme={null}
"redirects": [
  {
    "source": "/beta/:slug*",
    "destination": "/v2/:slug*"
  }
]
```

 `Update`  `tags`

```mdx Tag filters example wrap theme={null}
<Update label="20253" description="v0.0.10" tags={["Wintergreen", "Spearmint"]}>
   Wintergreen 

   Spearmint  10%
</Update>

   Spearmint 
</Update>

<Update label="20251" description="v0.0.08" tags={["Peppermint", "Spearmint"]}>
   Peppermint 

   Spearmint 
</Update>
```

<div id="subscribable-changelogs">
  ### 
</div>

 `Update`  URL  `/rss.xml` RSS `mintlify.com/docs/changelog/rss.xml`

 `Update`  `<Update>` RSS 

`Update`  RSS 

```xml Example RSS feed theme={null}
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<rss xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:content="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" version="2.0">
  <channel>
    <title><![CDATA[]]></title>
    <description><![CDATA[]]></description>
    <link>https://mintlify.com/docs</link>
    <generator>RSS for Node</generator>
    <lastBuildDate>Mon, 21 Jul 2025 21:21:47 GMT</lastBuildDate>
    <atom:link href="https://mintlify.com/docs/changelog/rss.xml" rel="self" type="application/rss+xml"/>
    <copyright><![CDATA[Mintlify]]></copyright>
    <docs>https://mintlify.com/docs</docs>
    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[20256]]></title>
      <link>https://mintlify.com/docs/changelog#june-2025</link>
      <guid isPermaLink="true">https://mintlify.com/docs/changelog#june-2025</guid>
      <pubDate>Mon, 23 Jun 2025 16:54:22 GMT</pubDate>
    </item>
  </channel>
</rss>
```

RSS  Slack

* [Slack](https://slack.com/help/articles/218688467-Add-RSS-feeds-to-Slack)
*  Zapier  [Email](https://zapier.com/apps/email/integrations/rss/1441/send-new-rss-feed-entries-via-email)
*  [Readybot](https://readybot.io)  [RSS Feeds to Discord Bot](https://rss.app/en/bots/rssfeeds-discord-bot)  Discord 

 RSS  RSS icon  frontmatter  `rss: true`

```mdx  theme={null}
---
rss: true
---
```

<div id="twoslash">
  ### Twoslash
</div>

 JavaScript  TypeScript  `twoslash` IDE 

<CodeGroup>
  ```ts twoslash Twoslash example theme={null}
  type Pet = "cat" | "dog" | "hamster";

  function adoptPet(name: string, type: Pet) {
  return `${name} the ${type} is now adopted!`;
  }

  // Hover to see the inferred types
  const message = adoptPet("Mintie", "cat");

  ```

  ````mdx Format theme={null}
  ```ts twoslash
  type Pet = "cat" | "dog" | "hamster";

  function adoptPet(name: string, type: Pet) {
    return `${name} the ${type} is now adopted!`;
  }

  // Hover to see the inferred types
  const message = adoptPet("Mintie", "cat");
  ````

  `````
  </CodeGroup>
  `````

<div id="expandable">
  ### 
</div>

 `expandable` 

<CodeGroup>
  ```python Expandable example expandable theme={null}
  from datetime import datetime, timedelta
  from typing import Dict, List, Optional
  from dataclasses import dataclass

  @dataclass
  class Book:
  title: str
  author: str
  isbn: str
  checked_out: bool = False
  due_date: Optional[datetime] = None

  class Library:
  def **init**(self):
  self.books: Dict[str, Book] = {}
  self.checkouts: Dict[str, List[str]] = {} # patron -> list of ISBNs

      def add_book(self, book: Book) -> None:
          if book.isbn in self.books:
              raise ValueError(f"Book with ISBN {book.isbn} already exists")
          self.books[book.isbn] = book

      def checkout_book(self, isbn: str, patron: str, days: int = 14) -> None:
          if patron not in self.checkouts:
              self.checkouts[patron] = []

          book = self.books.get(isbn)
          if not book:
              raise ValueError("Book not found")

          if book.checked_out:
              raise ValueError("Book is already checked out")

          if len(self.checkouts[patron]) >= 3:
              raise ValueError("Patron has reached checkout limit")

          book.checked_out = True
          book.due_date = datetime.now() + timedelta(days=days)
          self.checkouts[patron].append(isbn)

      def return_book(self, isbn: str) -> float:
          book = self.books.get(isbn)
          if not book or not book.checked_out:
              raise ValueError("Book not found or not checked out")

          late_fee = 0.0
          if datetime.now() > book.due_date:
              days_late = (datetime.now() - book.due_date).days
              late_fee = days_late * 0.50

          book.checked_out = False
          book.due_date = None

          # Remove from patron's checkouts
          for patron, books in self.checkouts.items():
              if isbn in books:
                  books.remove(isbn)
                  break

          return late_fee

      def search(self, query: str) -> List[Book]:
          query = query.lower()
          return [
              book for book in self.books.values()
              if query in book.title.lower() or query in book.author.lower()
          ]

  def main():
  library = Library()

      # Add some books
      books = [
          Book("The Hobbit", "J.R.R. Tolkien", "978-0-261-10295-4"),
          Book("1984", "George Orwell", "978-0-452-28423-4"),
      ]

      for book in books:
          library.add_book(book)

      # Checkout and return example
      library.checkout_book("978-0-261-10295-4", "patron123")
      late_fee = library.return_book("978-0-261-10295-4")
      print(f"Late fee: ${late_fee:.2f}")

  if **name** == "**main**":
  main()

  ```

  ````text  theme={null}
  ```python expandable
  from datetime import datetime, timedelta
  from typing import Dict, List, Optional
  from dataclasses import dataclass

  # ...

  if __name__ == "__main__":
      main()
  ````

  `````
  </CodeGroup>

  ### 

   `wrap` 

  <CodeGroup>
  ```javascript Wrap example wrap
  const greeting = "Hello, World! I am a long line of text that will wrap to the next line.";
  function sayHello() {
    console.log(greeting);
  }
  sayHello();
  ```

  ````mdx 
  ```javascript wrap
  const greeting = "Hello, World! I am a long line of text that will wrap to the next line.";
  function sayHello() {
    console.log(greeting);
  }
  sayHello();
  ```
  `````
</CodeGroup>

<div id="diff">
  ### 
</div>





* `// [!code ++]`
* `// [!code --]`



* `// [!code ++:3]`
* `// [!code --:5]`

JavaScript  `//`Python  `#`

<CodeGroup>
  ```js Diff example lines theme={null}
  const greeting = "Hello, World!"; // [!code ++]
  function sayHello() {
    console.log("Hello, World!"); // [!code --]
    console.log(greeting); // [!code ++]
  }
  sayHello();
  ```

  ````text Format theme={null}
  ```js lines
  const greeting = "Hello, World!"; // [!code ++]
  function sayHello() {
    console.log("Hello, World!"); // [!code --]
    console.log(greeting); // [!code ++]
  }
  sayHello();
  ```
  ````
</CodeGroup>

  ### 
</div>

* `.jpeg`, `.jpg`, `.jfif`, `.pjpeg`, `.pjp`

* `.bmp`

```html  theme={null}
></iframe>
```

```html  theme={null}
></video>
```

# 
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/create/reusable-snippets



 DRYDon't Repeat Yourself

<div id="creating-a-custom-snippet">
  ## 
</div>

**** `snippets` 

 `snippets` 

<div id="default-export">
  ### 
</div>

1.  props 
    word

```typescript snippets/my-snippet.mdx theme={null}
 
```

2. 

```typescript destination-file.mdx theme={null}
---
title: 
description: 
---

import MySnippet from '/snippets/path/to/my-snippet.mdx';

## 

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

<MySnippet/>

```

<div id="exporting-with-variables">
  ### 
</div>

1.  props  word

```typescript snippets/my-snippet.mdx theme={null}
 {word}
```

2. 

```typescript destination-file.mdx theme={null}
---
title: 
description: 
---

import MySnippet from '/snippets/path/to/my-snippet.mdx';

## 

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

<MySnippet word="bananas" />

```

<div id="reusable-variables">
  ### 
</div>

1. 

```typescript snippets/path/to/custom-variables.mdx theme={null}
export const myName = '';

export const myObject = { fruit: '' };
```

2. 

```typescript destination-file.mdx theme={null}
---
title: 
description: 
---

import { myName, myObject } from '/snippets/path/to/custom-variables.mdx';

 {myName} {myObject.fruit}
```

<div id="jsx-snippets">
  ### JSX 
</div>

1.  JSX  [React ](/zh/customize/react-components)

```js icon=square-js snippets/my-jsx-snippet.jsx theme={null}
export const MyJSXSnippet = () => {
  return (
    <div>
      <h1></h1>
    </div>
  )
}
```

<Note>
   JSX `=>` `function` 
</Note>

2. 

```typescript destination-file.mdx theme={null}
---
title: 
description: 
---

import { MyJSXSnippet } from '/snippets/my-jsx-snippet.jsx';

<MyJSXSnippet />
```

<div id="text-formatting">
  ## 
</div>

 Markdown 

<div id="basic-formatting">
  ### 
</div>



|       |          |                      |         |
| ------- | ---------- | ---------------------- | --------- |
| ****  | `**text**` | `**important note**`   | ****  |
| **    | `_text_`   | `_emphasis_`           | **      |
| ~~~~ | `~text~`   | `~deprecated feature~` | ~~~~ |

<div id="combining-formats">
  ### 
</div>



```mdx  theme={null}
**__**
**~~~~**
*~~~~**
```

******<br />
**~~~~**<br />
*~~~~*

<div id="superscript-and-subscript">
  ### 
</div>

 HTML 

|  |                 |                     |                   |
| -- | ----------------- | --------------------- | ------------------- |
|  | `<sup>text</sup>` | `example<sup>2</sup>` | example<sup>2</sup> |
|  | `<sub>text</sub>` | `example<sub>n</sub>` | example<sub>n</sub> |

#  404 
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/customize/custom-404-page

 404 

 404 

 404 

<div id="configuration">
  ## 
</div>

 `docs.json`  `errors.404`  404 

```json  theme={null}
"errors": {
  "404": {
    "redirect": false,
    "title": "",
    "description": "__****"
  }
}
```

<div id="parameters">
  ## 
</div>

<ResponseField name="redirect" type="boolean">
  

   `true` 

   `false`  404 
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="title" type="string">
  404 Page not found
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="description" type="string">
  404  Markdown 
</ResponseField>

<div id="set-a-canonical-url">
  ##  URL
</div>

 DNS  URL URL  URL  SEO

 `docs.json`  `canonical` 

```json  theme={null}
"seo": {
    "metatags": {
        "canonical": "https://www.your-custom-domain-here.com"
    }
}
```

 `https://www.your-custom-domain-here.com`  domain domain  `docs.mintlify.com`

```json  theme={null}
"seo": {
    "metatags": {
        "canonical": "https://docs.mintlify.com"
    }
}
```

# 
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/customize/fonts



 Google Fonts

 `docs.json`  [fonts ](/zh/organize/settings#param-fonts) 

<div id="google-fonts">
  ## Google Fonts
</div>

 `docs.json` Mintlify  [Google Fonts](https://fonts.google.com)

```json docs.json theme={null}
"fonts": {
  "family": "Inter"
}
```

<div id="local-fonts">
  ## 
</div>

 `docs.json` 

<div id="setting-up-local-fonts">
  ### 
</div>

<Steps>
  <Step title="">
     `fonts` 

    ```text  theme={null}
    your-project/
     fonts/
        InterDisplay-Regular.woff2
        InterDisplay-Bold.woff2
     docs.json
     ...
    ```
  </Step>

  <Step title=" docs.json ">
    

    ```json docs.json theme={null}
    {
      "fonts": {
        "family": "InterDisplay",
        "source": "/fonts/InterDisplay-Regular.woff2",
        "format": "woff2",
        "weight": 400
      }
    }
    ```
  </Step>
</Steps>

<div id="local-fonts-for-headings-and-body">
  ### 
</div>

 `docs.json` 

```json docs.json theme={null}
{
  "fonts": {
    "heading": {
      "family": "InterDisplay",
      "source": "/fonts/InterDisplay-Bold.woff2",
      "format": "woff2",
      "weight": 700
    },
    "body": {
      "family": "InterDisplay",
      "source": "/fonts/InterDisplay-Regular.woff2",
      "format": "woff2",
      "weight": 400
    }
  }
}
```

<div id="externally-hosted-fonts">
  ## 
</div>

 `docs.json`  URL 

```json docs.json theme={null}
{
  "fonts": {
    "family": "Hubot Sans",
    "source": "https://mintlify-assets.b-cdn.net/fonts/Hubot-Sans.woff2",
    "format": "woff2",
    "weight": 400
  }
}
```

<div id="font-configuration-reference">
  ## 
</div>

<ResponseField name="fonts" type="object">
  

  <Expandable title="Fonts">
    <ResponseField name="family" type="string" required>
       Inter  Playfair Display
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="weight" type="number">
       400  700 550
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="source" type="string (uri)">
       URL `https://mintlify-assets.b-cdn.net/fonts/Hubot-Sans.woff2` `/assets/fonts/InterDisplay.woff2` Google  `family`  Google Fonts source  URL
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="format" type="'woff' | 'woff2'">
       `source` 
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="heading" type="object">
      

      <Expandable title="Heading">
        <ResponseField name="family" type="string" required>
          
        </ResponseField>

        <ResponseField name="weight" type="number">
          
        </ResponseField>

        <ResponseField name="source" type="string (uri)">
           URL `https://mintlify-assets.b-cdn.net/fonts/Hubot-Sans.woff2` Google  `family`  Google Fonts source  URL
        </ResponseField>

        <ResponseField name="format" type="'woff' | 'woff2'">
           `source` 
        </ResponseField>
      </Expandable>
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="body" type="object">
      

      <Expandable title="Body">
        <ResponseField name="family" type="string" required>
          
        </ResponseField>

        <ResponseField name="weight" type="number">
          
        </ResponseField>

        <ResponseField name="source" type="string (uri)">
           URL `https://mintlify-assets.b-cdn.net/fonts/Hubot-Sans.woff2` Google  `family`  Google Fonts source  URL
        </ResponseField>

        <ResponseField name="format" type="'woff' | 'woff2'">
           `source` 
        </ResponseField>
      </Expandable>
    </ResponseField>
  </Expandable>
</ResponseField>


# React
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/customize/react-components

 React 

export const ColorGenerator = () => {
  const [hue, setHue] = useState(165);
  const [saturation, setSaturation] = useState(84);
  const [lightness, setLightness] = useState(31);
  const [colors, setColors] = useState([]);
  useEffect(() => {
    const newColors = [];
    for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
      const l = Math.max(10, Math.min(90, lightness - 20 + i * 10));
      newColors.push(`hsl(${hue}, ${saturation}%, ${l}%)`);
    }
    setColors(newColors);
  }, [hue, saturation, lightness]);
  const copyToClipboard = color => {
    navigator.clipboard.writeText(color).then(() => {
      console.log(`Copied ${color} to clipboard!`);
    }).catch(err => {
      console.error("Failed to copy: ", err);
    });
  };
  return <div className="p-4 border dark:border-white/10 rounded-2xl not-prose">
      <div className="space-y-4">
        <div className="space-y-2">
          <label className="block text-sm text-zinc-950/70 dark:text-white/70">
            Hue: {hue}
            <input type="range" min="0" max="360" value={hue} onChange={e => setHue(Number.parseInt(e.target.value))} className="w-full h-2 bg-zinc-950/20 rounded-lg appearance-none cursor-pointer dark:bg-white/20 mt-1" style={{
    background: `linear-gradient(to right, 
                  hsl(0, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%), 
                  hsl(60, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%), 
                  hsl(120, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%), 
                  hsl(180, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%), 
                  hsl(240, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%), 
                  hsl(300, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%), 
                  hsl(360, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%))`
  }} />
          </label>

          <label className="block text-sm text-zinc-950/70 dark:text-white/70">
            Saturation: {saturation}%
            <input type="range" min="0" max="100" value={saturation} onChange={e => setSaturation(Number.parseInt(e.target.value))} className="w-full h-2 bg-zinc-950/20 rounded-lg appearance-none cursor-pointer dark:bg-white/20 mt-1" style={{
    background: `linear-gradient(to right, 
                  hsl(${hue}, 0%, ${lightness}%), 
                  hsl(${hue}, 50%, ${lightness}%), 
                  hsl(${hue}, 100%, ${lightness}%))`
  }} />
          </label>

          <label className="block text-sm text-zinc-950/70 dark:text-white/70">
            Lightness: {lightness}%
            <input type="range" min="0" max="100" value={lightness} onChange={e => setLightness(Number.parseInt(e.target.value))} className="w-full h-2 bg-zinc-950/20 rounded-lg appearance-none cursor-pointer dark:bg-white/20 mt-1" style={{
    background: `linear-gradient(to right, 
                  hsl(${hue}, ${saturation}%, 0%), 
                  hsl(${hue}, ${saturation}%, 50%), 
                  hsl(${hue}, ${saturation}%, 100%))`
  }} />
          </label>
        </div>

        <div className="flex space-x-2">
          {colors.map((color, idx) => <div key={idx} className="h-16 rounded flex-1 cursor-pointer transition-transform hover:scale-105" style={{
    backgroundColor: color
  }} title={`Click to copy: ${color}`} onClick={() => copyToClipboard(color)} />)}
        </div>

        <div className="text-sm font-mono text-zinc-950/70 dark:text-white/70">
          <p>
            Base color: hsl({hue}, {saturation}%, {lightness}%)
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>;
};

[React ](https://react.dev) 

<div id="using-react-components">
  ##  React 
</div>

 `MDX`  [React hooks](https://react.dev/reference/react/hooks)  React 

<div id="example">

</div>

 `Counter`  `<Counter />` 

```mdx  theme={null}
export const Counter = () => {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0)

  const increment = () => setCount(count + 1)
  const decrement = () => setCount(count - 1)

  return (
  <div className="flex items-center justify-center">
      <div className="flex items-center rounded-xl overflow-hidden border border-zinc-950/20 dark:border-white/20">
        <button
          onClick={decrement}
          className="flex items-center justify-center h-8 w-8 text-zinc-950/80 dark:text-white/80 border-r border-zinc-950/20 dark:border-white/20"
          aria-label=""
        >
          -
        </button>

        <div className="flex text-sm items-center justify-center h-8 px-6 text-zinc-950/80 dark:text-white/80 font-medium min-w-[4rem] text-center">
          {count}
        </div>

        <button
          onClick={increment}
          className="flex items-center justify-center h-8 w-8 text-zinc-950/80 dark:text-white/80 border-l border-zinc-950/20 dark:border-white/20"
          aria-label=""
        >
          +
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
  )
}

<Counter />
```

export const Counter = () => {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);
  const increment = () => setCount(count + 1);
  const decrement = () => setCount(count - 1);
  return <div className="flex items-center justify-center">
      <div className="flex items-center rounded-xl overflow-hidden border border-zinc-950/20 dark:border-white/20">
        <button onClick={decrement} className="flex items-center justify-center h-8 w-8 text-zinc-950/80 dark:text-white/80 border-r border-zinc-950/20 dark:border-white/20" aria-label="">
          -
        </button>

        <div className="flex text-sm items-center justify-center h-8 px-6 text-zinc-950/80 dark:text-white/80 font-medium min-w-[4rem] text-center">
          {count}
        </div>

        <button onClick={increment} className="flex items-center justify-center h-8 w-8 text-zinc-950/80 dark:text-white/80 border-l border-zinc-950/20 dark:border-white/20" aria-label="">
          +
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>;
};


 React 

<Counter />

 `ColorGenerator`  React Hook `MDX` 

 `snippets`  `color-generator.jsx` 

```mdx /snippets/color-generator.jsx [expandable] theme={null}
export const ColorGenerator = () => {
  const [hue, setHue] = useState(180)
  const [saturation, setSaturation] = useState(50)
  const [lightness, setLightness] = useState(50)
  const [colors, setColors] = useState([])

  useEffect(() => {
    const newColors = []
    for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
      const l = Math.max(10, Math.min(90, lightness - 20 + i * 10))
      newColors.push(`hsl(${hue}, ${saturation}%, ${l}%)`)
    }
    setColors(newColors)
  }, [hue, saturation, lightness])

  const copyToClipboard = (color) => {
    navigator.clipboard
      .writeText(color)
      .then(() => {
        console.log(` ${color} `)
      })
      .catch((err) => {
        console.error("", err)
      })
  }

  return (
    <div className="p-4 border dark:border-zinc-950/80 rounded-xl not-prose">
      <div className="space-y-4">
        <div className="space-y-2">
          <label className="block text-sm text-zinc-950/70 dark:text-white/70">
            {hue}
            <input
              type="range"
              min="0"
              max="360"
              value={hue}
              onChange={(e) => setHue(Number.parseInt(e.target.value))}
              className="w-full h-2 bg-zinc-950/20 rounded-lg appearance-none cursor-pointer dark:bg-white/20 mt-1"
              style={{
                background: `linear-gradient(to right, 
                  hsl(0, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%), 
                  hsl(60, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%), 
                  hsl(120, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%), 
                  hsl(180, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%), 
                  hsl(240, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%), 
                  hsl(300, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%), 
                  hsl(360, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%))`,
              }}
            />
          </label>

          <label className="block text-sm text-zinc-950/70 dark:text-white/70">
            {saturation}%
            <input
              type="range"
              min="0"
              max="100"
              value={saturation}
              onChange={(e) => setSaturation(Number.parseInt(e.target.value))}
              className="w-full h-2 bg-zinc-950/20 rounded-lg appearance-none cursor-pointer dark:bg-white/20 mt-1"
              style={{
                background: `linear-gradient(to right, 
                  hsl(${hue}, 0%, ${lightness}%), 
                  hsl(${hue}, 50%, ${lightness}%), 
                  hsl(${hue}, 100%, ${lightness}%))`,
              }}
            />
          </label>

          <label className="block text-sm text-zinc-950/70 dark:text-white/70">
            {lightness}%
            <input
              type="range"
              min="0"
              max="100"
              value={lightness}
              onChange={(e) => setLightness(Number.parseInt(e.target.value))}
              className="w-full h-2 bg-zinc-950/20 rounded-lg appearance-none cursor-pointer dark:bg-white/20 mt-1"
              style={{
                background: `linear-gradient(to right, 
                  hsl(${hue}, ${saturation}%, 0%), 
                  hsl(${hue}, ${saturation}%, 50%), 
                  hsl(${hue}, ${saturation}%, 100%))`,
              }}
            />
          </label>
        </div>

        <div className="flex space-x-1">
          {colors.map((color, idx) => (
            <div
              key={idx}
              className="h-16 rounded flex-1 cursor-pointer transition-transform hover:scale-105"
              style={{ backgroundColor: color }}
              title={`${color}`}
              onClick={() => copyToClipboard(color)}
            />
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="text-sm font-mono text-zinc-950/70 dark:text-white/70">
          <p>
            hsl({hue}, {saturation}%, {lightness}%)
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  )
}
```

export const ThemeCard = ({title, value, description, href}) => {
  return <a className="mt-4 gap-10 group cursor-pointer" href={href}>
      <div>
        <img className="mt-0 rounded-2xl group-hover:scale-105 transition-all block dark:hidden" src={`https://mintlify.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/mintlify/images/themes/${value}-light.png`} alt={title} noZoom />
        <img className="mt-0 rounded-2xl group-hover:scale-105 transition-all hidden dark:block" src={`https://mintlify.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/mintlify/images/themes/${value}-dark.png`} alt={title} noZoom />
      </div>
      <div>
        <div className="mt-4 flex space-x-2 items-center">
        <h4 className="text-base font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-200">{title}</h4>
        <label className="text-sm text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">"{value}"</label>
      </div>
        <div class="mt-1 prose-sm prose-gray mb-2 text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">{description}</div>
        <div className="flex items-center gap-1 mt-2 text-green-600 group-hover:text-green-800 dark:text-green-500 dark:group-hover:text-green-400">
          <span className="text-sm font-medium">
            
          </span>
          <svg className="size-3 group-hover:translate-x-0.5 transition-all" width="14" height="15" viewBox="0 0 14 15" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
            <path d="M5.05566 2.70996L9.91678 7.57107L5.05566 12.4322" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" />
          </svg>
        </div>
      </div>
    </a>;
};

        1. Enterprise applications **New application**

         Single Sign-On  **SAML**Basic SAML Configuration

        * Identifier (Entity ID)Mintlify  Audience URI
        * Reply URL (Assertion Consumer Service URL)Mintlify  ACS URL

         **Save**

         Attributes & Claims 

        1. Required Claim **Unique User Identifier (Name ID)**
        2.  Source  `user.primaryauthoritativeemail`
        3.  Additional claims

           | ----------- | ---------------- |
           | `firstName` | `user.givenname` |

        2.

      </Step>
    </Steps>

    ### 

     `docs.foo.com`

    ** Mintlify **

    ### 

     `foo.com/docs` `auth.foo.com`  Authorization Code Flow  OAuth 

    ** OAuth **

    * **Authorization URL**`https://auth.foo.com/authorization`
    * **Client ID**`ydybo4SD8PR73vzWWd6S0ObH`
    * **Scopes**`['provider.users.docs']`
    * **Token URL**`https://auth.foo.com/exchange`
    * **Info API URL**`https://api.foo.com/docs/user-info`

    ```json  theme={null}
    }
    ```

  <Tab title="JWTJSON Web Token">

    ### 

    <Steps>
      <Step title="Generate a private key.">
        1.  [Authentication](https://dashboard.mintlify.com/settings/deployment/authentication)
        2.  **Full Authentication**  **Partial Authentication**
        3.  **JWT**
        4.  URL **Save changes**
        5.  **Generate new key**
        6.  key 
      </Step>

      <Step title="Integrate Mintlify authentication into your login flow.">
        

        *  JWT `User` [User data format](/zh/deploy/personalization-setup#user-data-format) 
        *  EdDSA  JWT 
        *  URL `/login/jwt-callback`  JWT  hash 
      </Step>
    </Steps>

    ### 

     `docs.foo.com` `foo.com`

     `https://foo.com/docs-login` 

    

    *  Mintlify  JWT
    *  JWT  `https://docs.foo.com/login/jwt-callback#{SIGNED_JWT}`

    <CodeGroup>
      ```ts TypeScript theme={null}
      import * as jose from 'jose';
      import { Request, Response } from 'express';

      const TWO_WEEKS_IN_MS = 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 7 * 2;

      const signingKey = await jose.importPKCS8(process.env.MINTLIFY_PRIVATE_KEY, 'EdDSA');

      export async function handleRequest(req: Request, res: Response) {
        const user = {
          expiresAt: Math.floor((Date.now() + TWO_WEEKS_IN_MS) / 1000), // 2 week session expiration
          groups: res.locals.user.groups,
          content: {
            firstName: res.locals.user.firstName,
            lastName: res.locals.user.lastName,
          },
        };

        const jwt = await new jose.SignJWT(user)
          .setProtectedHeader({ alg: 'EdDSA' })
          .setExpirationTime('10 s') // 10 second JWT expiration
          .sign(signingKey);

        return res.redirect(`https://docs.foo.com/login/jwt-callback#${jwt}`);
      }
      ```

      ```python Python theme={null}
      import jwt # pyjwt
      import os

      from datetime import datetime, timedelta
      from fastapi.responses import RedirectResponse

      private_key = os.getenv(MINTLIFY_JWT_PEM_SECRET_NAME, '')

      @router.get('/auth')
      async def return_mintlify_auth_status(current_user):
        jwt_token = jwt.encode(
          payload={
            'exp': int((datetime.now() + timedelta(seconds=10)).timestamp()),    # 10 second JWT expiration
            'expiresAt': int((datetime.now() + timedelta(weeks=2)).timestamp()), # 1 week session expiration
            'groups': ['admin'] if current_user.is_admin else [],
            'content': {
              'firstName': current_user.first_name,
              'lastName': current_user.last_name,
            },
          },
          key=private_key,
          algorithm='EdDSA'
        )

        return RedirectResponse(url=f'https://docs.foo.com/login/jwt-callback#{jwt_token}', status_code=302)
      ```
    </CodeGroup>

    ### 

     URL 

    1. `https://docs.foo.com/quickstart`
    2.  URL query `https://foo.com/docs-login?redirect=%2Fquickstart`
    3.  `https://docs.foo.com/login/jwt-callback?redirect=%2Fquickstart#{SIGNED_JWT}`
    4. 
  </Tab>
</Tabs>

```mdx Default vale.ini configuration expandable theme={null}
#

#  Vale  MDX

# MDX

BasedOnStyles = Vale
Vale.Terms = NO # 

# `import ...`, `export ...`
# `<Component ... />`
# `<Component>...</Component>`
# `{ ... }`
TokenIgnores = (?sm)((?:import|export) .+?$), \
(?<!`)(<\w+ ?.+ ?\/>)(?!`), \
(<[A-Z]\w+>.+?<\/[A-Z]\w+>)

# 
# `<Component \n ... />`
BlockIgnores = (?sm)^(<\w+\n .*\s\/>)$, \
(?sm)^({.+.*})

CommentDelimiters = {/*, */}
```

<div id="set-up-a-cloudflare-worker">
  ##  Cloudflare Worker
</div>

<Warning>
   DNS Cloudflare CNAME 
</Warning>

<div id="proxies-with-vercel-deployments">
  ###  Vercel 
</div>

 Vercel  Cloudflare  Vercel  domain  SSL 

 Vercel  Let's Encrypt SSL  domain 

<div id="required-path-allowlist">
  #### 
</div>

 Cloudflare Worker 

* `/.well-known/acme-challenge/*` -  Let's Encrypt 
* `/.well-known/vercel/*` -  Vercel domain 

 Cloudflare 

<div id="header-forwarding-requirements">
  #### 
</div>

 Worker  `HOST` 

<div id="configure-routing">
  ### 
</div>

 Cloudflare  **Edit Code** Worker  Worker  [Cloudflare ](https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers-ai/get-started/dashboard/#development)

<Tip>
   `[SUBDOMAIN]`  `[YOUR_DOMAIN]`  URL `/docs` 
</Tip>

```javascript  theme={null}
addEventListener("fetch", (event) => {
  event.respondWith(handleRequest(event.request));
});

async function handleRequest(request) {
  try {
    const urlObject = new URL(request.url);
    
    //  Vercel 
    if (urlObject.pathname.startsWith('/.well-known/')) {
      return await fetch(request);
    }
    
    //  docs 
    if (/^\/docs/.test(urlObject.pathname)) {
      //  Mintlify
      const DOCS_URL = "[SUBDOMAIN].mintlify.dev";
      const CUSTOM_URL = "[YOUR_DOMAIN]";

      let url = new URL(request.url);
      url.hostname = DOCS_URL;

      let proxyRequest = new Request(url, request);

      proxyRequest.headers.set("Host", DOCS_URL);
      proxyRequest.headers.set("X-Forwarded-Host", CUSTOM_URL);
      proxyRequest.headers.set("X-Forwarded-Proto", "https");
      //  Vercel IP
      proxyRequest.headers.set("CF-Connecting-IP", request.headers.get("CF-Connecting-IP"));

      return await fetch(proxyRequest);
    }
  } catch (error) {
    // 
    return await fetch(request);
  }
}
```

 **Deploy**

<Note>
   DNSDNS  14  48 
</Note>
