2.  Worker domain

<div id="webflow-custom-routing">
  ## Webflow 
</div>

 Webflow  domain  `/docs`  Mintlify  Cloudflare Workers 

<Warning>
   Worker landing page
</Warning>

1.  Webflow  `landing.yoursite.com`
2.  Worker 
3.  URL 
4.  Cloudflare  **Edit Code** Worker 

<Tip>  `[SUBDOMAIN]` `[YOUR_DOMAIN]`  URL`[LANDING_DOMAIN]`  URL `/docs`  </Tip>

```javascript  theme={null}
  addEventListener("fetch", (event) => {
  event.respondWith(handleRequest(event.request));
  });
  async function handleRequest(request) {
  try {
    const urlObject = new URL(request.url);
    
    //  Vercel 
    if (urlObject.pathname.startsWith('/.well-known/')) {
      return await fetch(request);
    }
    
    //  docs 
    if (/^\/docs/.test(urlObject.pathname)) {
      //  Mintlify
      const DOCS_URL = "[SUBDOMAIN].mintlify.dev";
      const CUSTOM_URL = "[YOUR_DOMAIN]";
      let url = new URL(request.url);
      url.hostname = DOCS_URL;
      let proxyRequest = new Request(url, request);
      proxyRequest.headers.set("Host", DOCS_URL);
      proxyRequest.headers.set("X-Forwarded-Host", CUSTOM_URL);
      proxyRequest.headers.set("X-Forwarded-Proto", "https");
      //  Vercel IP
      proxyRequest.headers.set("CF-Connecting-IP", request.headers.get("CF-Connecting-IP"));
      return await fetch(proxyRequest);
    }
    // 
    const MAIN_SITE_URL = "[LANDING_DOMAIN]";
    if (MAIN_SITE_URL && MAIN_SITE_URL !== "[LANDING_DOMAIN]") {
      let mainSiteUrl = new URL(request.url);
      mainSiteUrl.hostname = MAIN_SITE_URL;
      return await fetch(mainSiteUrl, {
        method: request.method,
        headers: request.headers,
        body: request.body
      });
    }
  } catch (error) {
    // 
    return await fetch(request);
  }
  }
```

5.  **Deploy**

<Note>
   DNSDNS  14  48 
</Note>


# CSP
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/deploy/csp-configuration



CSPXSSMintlify  CSP CSP CSP 

<div id="csp-directives">
  ## CSP 
</div>

 CSP 

* `script-src`
* `style-src`
* `font-src`
* `img-src`
* `connect-src` API  WebSocket  URL
* `frame-src` frame  iframe  URL
* `default-src`

<div id="domain-whitelist">
  ## 
</div>

|                               |                     | CSP                       |  |
| :------------------------------ | :-------------------- | :-------------------------- | :--- |
| `d4tuoctqmanu0.cloudfront.net`  | KaTeX CSS          | `style-src`, `font-src`     |    |
| `*.mintlify.dev`                |                   | `connect-src`, `frame-src`  |    |
| `*.mintlify.com`                | API          | `connect-src`               |    |
| `leaves.mintlify.com`           | AI  API             | `connect-src`               |    |
| `d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net` |               | `img-src`                   |    |
| `d1ctpt7j8wusba.cloudfront.net` | Mint           | `connect-src`               |    |
| `mintcdn.com`                   |                | `img-src`, `connect-src`    |    |
| `*.mintcdn.com`                 |                | `img-src`, `connect-src`    |    |
| `api.mintlifytrieve.com`        |  API                | `connect-src`               |    |
| `cdn.jsdelivr.net`              | OG             | `script-src`, `img-src`     |    |
| `fonts.googleapis.com`          | Google              | `style-src`, `font-src`     |    |
| `www.googletagmanager.com`      | Google Analytics/GTM  | `script-src`, `connect-src` |    |
| `cdn.segment.com`               | Segment             | `script-src`, `connect-src` |    |
| `plausible.io`                  | Plausible           | `script-src`, `connect-src` |    |
| `us.posthog.com`                | PostHog             | `connect-src`               |    |
| `tag.clearbitscripts.com`       | Clearbit            | `script-src`                |    |
| `cdn.heapanalytics.com`         | Heap                | `script-src`                |    |
| `chat.cdn-plain.com`            | Plain            | `script-src`                |    |
| `chat-assets.frontapp.com`      | Front            | `script-src`                |    |
| `browser.sentry-cdn.com`        | Sentry            | `script-src`, `connect-src` |    |
| `js.sentry-cdn.com`             | Sentry JavaScript SDK | `script-src`                |    |

<div id="example-csp-configuration">
  ##  CSP 
</div>

<Note>
   domain Analytics  domain
</Note>

```text wrap theme={null}
Content-Security-Policy:
default-src 'self';
script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' cdn.jsdelivr.net www.googletagmanager.com cdn.segment.com plausible.io
us.posthog.com tag.clearbitscripts.com cdn.heapanalytics.com chat.cdn-plain.com chat-assets.frontapp.com
browser.sentry-cdn.com js.sentry-cdn.com;
style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' d4tuoctqmanu0.cloudfront.net fonts.googleapis.com;
font-src 'self' d4tuoctqmanu0.cloudfront.net fonts.googleapis.com;
img-src 'self' data: blob: d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net mintcdn.com *.mintcdn.com cdn.jsdelivr.net;
connect-src 'self' *.mintlify.dev *.mintlify.com d1ctpt7j8wusba.cloudfront.net mintcdn.com *.mintcdn.com
api.mintlifytrieve.com www.googletagmanager.com cdn.segment.com plausible.io us.posthog.com browser.sentry-cdn.com;
frame-src 'self' *.mintlify.dev;
```

<div id="common-configurations-by-proxy-type">
  ## 
</div>



<div id="cloudflare-configuration">
  ### Cloudflare 
</div>

 Response Header Transform 

1.  Cloudflare  **Rules > Overview**
2.  **Create rule > Response Header Transform Rule**
3. 

* **Modify response header** static
  * **Header name**`Content-Security-Policy`
  * **Header value**
    ```text wrap theme={null}
    default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' cdn.jsdelivr.net; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' d4tuoctqmanu0.cloudfront.net fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' d4tuoctqmanu0.cloudfront.net fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net mintcdn.com *.mintcdn.com cdn.jsdelivr.net; connect-src 'self' *.mintlify.dev *.mintlify.com d1ctpt7j8wusba.cloudfront.net mintcdn.com *.mintcdn.com api.mintlifytrieve.com; frame-src 'self' *.mintlify.dev;
    ```

4. 

<div id="aws-cloudfront-configuration">
  ### AWS CloudFront 
</div>

 CloudFront 

```json  theme={null}
{
"ResponseHeadersPolicy": {
    "Name": "MintlifyCSP",
    "Config": {
    "SecurityHeadersConfig": {
        "ContentSecurityPolicy": {
        "ContentSecurityPolicy": "default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' cdn.jsdelivr.net; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' d4tuoctqmanu0.cloudfront.net fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' d4tuoctqmanu0.cloudfront.net fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net mintcdn.com *.mintcdn.com cdn.jsdelivr.net; connect-src 'self' *.mintlify.dev *.mintlify.com d1ctpt7j8wusba.cloudfront.net mintcdn.com *.mintcdn.com api.mintlifytrieve.com; frame-src 'self' *.mintlify.dev;",
        "Override": true
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

<div id="vercel-configuration">
  ### Vercel 
</div>

 `vercel.json`

```json  theme={null}
{
"headers": [
    {
    "source": "/(.*)",
    "headers": [
        {
        "key": "Content-Security-Policy",
        "value": "default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' cdn.jsdelivr.net; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' d4tuoctqmanu0.cloudfront.net fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' d4tuoctqmanu0.cloudfront.net fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: d3gk2c5xim1je2.cloudfront.net mintcdn.com *.mintcdn.com cdn.jsdelivr.net; connect-src 'self' *.mintlify.dev *.mintlify.com d1ctpt7j8wusba.cloudfront.net mintcdn.com *.mintcdn.com api.mintlifytrieve.com; frame-src 'self' *.mintlify.dev;"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```

<div id="troubleshooting">
  ## 
</div>

 CSP 

1. 
2.  **Console** 
3. 
   * `Content Security Policy: The page's settings blocked the loading of a resource`
   * `Refused to load the script/stylesheet because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive`
   * `Refused to connect to because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive`

<div id="github-app-connection-issues">
  ### GitHub 
</div>

 GitHub 

<Steps>
  <Step title=" GitHub  Mintlify ">
    1.  GitHub  [installations](https://github.com/settings/installations) Mintlify  **Configure** **Uninstall**
    2.  [Authorized GitHub Apps](https://github.com/settings/apps/authorizations) Mintlify  **Revoke**
  </Step>

  <Step title=" Mintlify ">
    1.  Mintlify  [Git Settings](https://dashboard.mintlify.com/settings/deployment/git-settings)  GitHub 
    2.  [My Profile](https://dashboard.mintlify.com/settings/account) 
  </Step>
</Steps>

  <Step title=" URL  webhook">
    URL `https://leaves.mintlify.com/gitlab-webhook` webhook Mintlify
  </Step>

  <Step title="">
     Webhook 

    <Frame>

# 
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/deploy/personalization-setup



 API key

<div id="personalization-features">
  ## 
</div>



<div id="api-key-prefilling">
  ###  API key
</div>

 API  API 

<div id="dynamic-mdx-content">
  ###  MDX 
</div>

 `user` 

```jsx  theme={null}
{user.firstName} {user.org?.plan} ...
```

[](#user-data-format)

<div id="page-visibility">
  ### 
</div>

 frontmatter  `groups` 

 `groups` 

```mdx  theme={null}
---
title: ""
description: ""
groups: ["admin"]
---
```

<div id="user-data-format">
  ## 
</div>

 JSON  JWTJSON Web Token

```tsx  theme={null}
type User = {
  expiresAt?: number;
  groups?: string[];
  content?: Record<string, any>;
  apiPlaygroundInputs?: {
    header?: Record<string, any>;
    query?: Record<string, any>;
    cookie?: Record<string, any>;
    server?: Record<string, string>;
  };
};
```

<ParamField path="expiresAt" type="number">
  ** Unix **
  <Warning><b> JWT </b> JWT  `exp`  JWT  JWT  `exp` 10  `expiresAt` </Warning>
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="groups" type="string[]">
   groups frontmatter  `groups` 

  **** `groups: ["admin", "engineering"]`  `admin`  `engineering` 
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="content" type="object">
   `user`  `MDX` 

  ****

  ```json  theme={null}
  { "firstName": "Ronan", "company": "Acme Corp", "plan": "Enterprise" }
  ```

  ** `MDX` **

  ```mdx  theme={null}
  Welcome back, {user.firstName}! Your {user.plan} plan includes...
  ```

   `user` Welcome back, Ronan! Your Enterprise plan includes...

  ****

  ```jsx  theme={null}
  Authentication is an enterprise feature. {
    user.org === undefined
      ? <>To access this feature, first create an account at the <a href="https://dashboard.mintlify.com/login">Mintlify dashboard</a>.</>
      : user.org.plan !== 'enterprise'
        ? <>You are currently on the ${user.org.plan ?? 'free'} plan. See <a href="https://mintlify.com/pricing">our pricing page</a> for information about upgrading.</>
        : <>To request this feature for your enterprise org, contact your admin.</>
  }
  ```

  <Note>
    `user` `user`  `{}` `user`  `{user.org?.plan}`
  </Note>
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="apiPlaygroundInputs" type="object">
   API  API 

  ****

  ```json  theme={null}
  {
    "header": { "X-API-Key": "user_api_key_123" },
    "server": { "subdomain": "foo" },
    "query": { "org_id": "12345" }
  }
  ```

   `{ server: { subdomain: 'foo' } }`  `apiPlaygroundInputs`  `subdomain`  API 

  <Note>`header``query`  `cookie`  [OpenAPI ](https://swagger.io/docs/specification/authentication/)  `Authorization`  `Server`  `Authorization` </Note>
</ParamField>

<div id="example-user-data">
  ### 
</div>

```json  theme={null}
{
  "expiresAt": 1735689600,
  "groups": ["admin", "beta-users"],
  "content": {
    "firstName": "Jane",
    "lastName": "Smith",
    "company": "TechCorp",
    "plan": "Enterprise",
    "region": "us-west"
  },
  "apiPlaygroundInputs": {
    "header": {
      "Authorization": "Bearer abc123",
      "X-Org-ID": "techcorp"
    },
    "server": {
      "environment": "production",
      "region": "us-west"
    }
  }
}
```

<Tabs>
  <Tab title="JWTJSON Web Token">
    ### 

    *  JWT 
    *  URL 

    ### 

    <Steps>
      <Step title="">
        1.  [](https://dashboard.mintlify.com/settings/deployment/authentication)
        2.  **Personalization**
        3.  **JWT**
        4.  URL ****
        5.  **Generate new key**
        6.  key 
      </Step>

      <Step title=" Mintlify ">
        

        *  `User`  JWT [User data format](#user-data-format) 
        *  ES256  JWT 
        *  URL JWT  hash 
      </Step>
    </Steps>

    ### 

     `docs.foo.com`

     JWT  `https://foo.com/docs-login` 

    

    *  Mintlify  JWT
    *  JWT  `https://docs.foo.com#{SIGNED_JWT}`

    ```ts  theme={null}
    import * as jose from 'jose';
    import { Request, Response } from 'express';

    const TWO_WEEKS_IN_MS = 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 7 * 2;

    const signingKey = await jose.importPKCS8(process.env.MINTLIFY_PRIVATE_KEY, 'ES256');

    export async function handleRequest(req: Request, res: Response) {
      const user = {
        expiresAt: Math.floor((Date.now() + TWO_WEEKS_IN_MS) / 1000),
        groups: res.locals.user.groups,
        content: {
          firstName: res.locals.user.firstName,
          lastName: res.locals.user.lastName,
        },
      };

      const jwt = await new jose.SignJWT(user)
        .setProtectedHeader({ alg: 'ES256' })
        .setExpirationTime('10 s')
        .sign(signingKey);

      return res.redirect(`https://docs.foo.com#${jwt}`);
    }
    ```

    ### 

     URL `https://docs.foo.com/page#jwt={SIGNED_JWT}&anchor={ANCHOR}`

    ****

    *  URL`https://docs.foo.com/quickstart#step-one`
    *  URL`https://docs.foo.com/quickstart#jwt={SIGNED_JWT}&anchor=step-one`
  </Tab>

  <Tab title="OAuth 2.0">
    ### 

    *  PKCE Auth CodeOAuth 
    *  OAuth  API

        2.  **Personalization**
        3.  **OAuth** 

        * **Authorization URL** OAuth 
        * **Client ID** OAuth 2.0 
        * **Scopes****** scope  `provider.users.docs`  scope `provider.users.docs` scopes 
        * **Token URL** OAuth 
        * **Info API URL**

        4.  ****
      </Step>

      <Step title="Configure your OAuth server.">
        1. [](https://dashboard.mintlify.com/settings/deployment/authentication) **Redirect URL**
        2.  URL  OAuth  URL
      </Step>
    </Steps>

    ### 

     `foo.com/docs` PKCE  OAuth 

     `api.foo.com/docs/user-info` **** `provider.users.docs` scope  OAuth 

    ```json  theme={null}
    {
      "content": {
        "firstName": "Jane",
        "lastName": "Doe"
      },
      "groups": ["engineering", "admin"]
    }
    ```

    ** OAuth **

    * **Authorization URL**: `https://auth.foo.com/authorization`
    * **Client ID**: `ydybo4SD8PR73vzWWd6S0ObH`
    * **Scopes**: `['docs-user-info']`
    * **Token URL**: `https://auth.foo.com/exchange`
    * **Info API URL**: `https://api.foo.com/docs/user-info`

    ** OAuth ** URL

# 
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/deploy/reverse-proxy

</Note>



 domain SSL  Analytics 

<div id="routing-configuration">
  ## 
</div>

 Mintlify 

| Path                              | Destination                     | Caching |
| --------------------------------- | ------------------------------- | ------- |
| `/.well-known/acme-challenge/*`   | `<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app` |      |
| `/.well-known/vercel/*`           | `<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app` |      |
| `/mintlify-assets/_next/static/*` | `<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app` |     |
| `/_mintlify/*`                    | `<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app` |      |
| `/*`                              | `<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app` |      |
| `/`                               | `<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app` |      |

<div id="required-header-configuration">
  ## 
</div>



* **Origin** `<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app`
* **X-Forwarded-For** IP 
* **X-Forwarded-Proto**HTTP/HTTPS
* **X-Real-IP** IP 
* **User-Agent**

<Warning>
   `Host` 
</Warning>

<div id="example-nginx-configuration">
  ## Nginx 
</div>

```nginx  theme={null}
server {
    listen 80;
    server_name <your-domain>.com;

    # Let's Encrypt 
    location ~ ^/\.well-known/acme-challenge/ {
        proxy_pass https://<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header Origin <your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        proxy_set_header User-Agent $http_user_agent;

        # 
        add_header Cache-Control "no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate";
    }

    # Vercel 
    location ~ ^/\.well-known/vercel/ {
        proxy_pass https://<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header Origin <your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        proxy_set_header User-Agent $http_user_agent;

        # 
        add_header Cache-Control "no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate";
    }

    # 
    location ~ ^/mintlify-assets/_next/static/ {
        proxy_pass https://<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header Origin <your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        proxy_set_header User-Agent $http_user_agent;

        # 
        add_header Cache-Control "public, max-age=86400";
    }

    # Mintlify 
    location ~ ^/_mintlify/ {
        proxy_pass https://<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header Origin <your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        proxy_set_header User-Agent $http_user_agent;

        #  Mintlify 
        add_header Cache-Control "no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate";
    }

    # 
    location = / {
        proxy_pass https://<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header Origin <your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        proxy_set_header User-Agent $http_user_agent;

        # 
        add_header Cache-Control "no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate";
    }

    # 
    location / {
        proxy_pass https://<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header Origin <your-subdomain>.mintlify.app;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        proxy_set_header User-Agent $http_user_agent;

        # 
        add_header Cache-Control "no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate";
    }
}
```

  ### 404

****API 

**** `Host`  `Origin` 

****

*  `Host` 
*  `Origin`  `<your-subdomain>.mintlify.app`

  ###

****

****

**** `/mintlify-assets/_next/static/*` 


# AWS Route 53  CloudFront
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/deploy/route53-cloudfront

 AWS 

 AWS Route 53  CloudFront  `yoursite.com/docs`  DNS CloudFront 

<div id="repository-structure">
  ## 
</div>

 `yoursite.com/docs` `docs/` 

<div id="high-level-overview">
  ## 
</div>

**CachingDisabled**

* `/.well-known/acme-challenge/*` - Let's Encrypt 
* `/.well-known/vercel/*` -  domain 
* `/docs/*` - 
* `/docs/` - 

**CachingEnabled**

* `/mintlify-assets/_next/static/*`
* `Default (*)` - 

 Behaviors **origin request policy** `AllViewerExceptHostHeader`

<img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=54d70b32256a271160dca8f51a85be43" alt="CloudFront &#x22;Behaviors&#x22;  4 /docs/*/docsDefault  /.well-known/*" data-og-width="1603" width="1603" data-og-height="365" height="365" data-path="images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=68a8af85258ac81883983503556ad026 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=35386a988b71413602a9de7571d9d0b3 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=2b0411253ef116b698c81aa90877b34d 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=c8370b98c6a943fb94c68a19eced0e42 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=688d3a4c1154fde50ff968998e08fe1e 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ/images/cloudfront/all-behaviors.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=zdW5Dy7s3S_tL7uQ&q=85&s=ce125cf98f6d34cdf2c060243b432e1e 2500w" />

4.  Web Application Firewall (WAF) 

<Frame>

 "Cache policy"  **CachingDisabled**

   `.well-known/*`  Vercel  2

  * `/.well-known/acme-challenge/*` - Let's Encrypt

  ### 
</div>

 **Path pattern** behavior `/docs` **Origin and origin groups**  `.mintlify.dev`  URL `acme.mintlify.dev`

* Cache policy **CachingOptimized**
* Origin request policy **AllViewerExceptHostHeader**
* Viewer Protocol Policy **Redirect HTTP to HTTPS**

2.  ****

<div id="check-behaviors-are-set-up-correctly">
  ###

# Vercel
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/deploy/vercel

 Vercel 

export const VercelJsonGenerator = () => {
  const [subdomain, setSubdomain] = useState('[SUBDOMAIN]');
  const [subpath, setSubpath] = useState('[SUBPATH]');
  const vercelConfig = {
    rewrites: [{
      source: "/_mintlify/:path*",
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/_mintlify/:path*`
    }, {
      source: "/api/request",
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/_mintlify/api/request`
    }, {
      source: `/${subpath}`,
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/${subpath}`
    }, {
      source: `/${subpath}/llms.txt`,
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/llms.txt`
    }, {
      source: `/${subpath}/llms-full.txt`,
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/llms-full.txt`
    }, {
      source: `/${subpath}/sitemap.xml`,
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/sitemap.xml`
    }, {
      source: `/${subpath}/robots.txt`,
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/robots.txt`
    }, {
      source: `/${subpath}/:path*`,
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/${subpath}/:path*`
    }, {
      source: "/mintlify-assets/:path+",
      destination: `https://${subdomain}.mintlify.app/mintlify-assets/:path+`
    }]
  };
  const copyToClipboard = () => {
    navigator.clipboard.writeText(JSON.stringify(vercelConfig, null, 2)).then(() => {
      console.log('Copied config to clipboard!');
    }).catch(err => {
      console.error("Failed to copy: ", err);
    });
  };
  return <div className="p-4 border dark:border-white/10 rounded-2xl not-prose space-y-4">
      <div className="space-y-4">
        <div>
          <label className="block text-sm text-zinc-950/70 dark:text-white/70 mb-1">
            Subdomain
          </label>
          <input type="text" value={subdomain} onChange={e => setSubdomain(e.target.value)} placeholder="your-subdomain" className="w-full p-1 text-sm rounded border dark:border-white/10 bg-transparent" />
        </div>
        <div>
          <label className="block text-sm text-zinc-950/70 dark:text-white/70 mb-1">
            Subpath
          </label>
          <input type="text" value={subpath} onChange={e => setSubpath(e.target.value)} placeholder="docs" className="w-full p-1 text-sm rounded border dark:border-white/10 bg-transparent" />
        </div>
      </div>
      <div className="relative">
        <button onClick={copyToClipboard} className="absolute top-2 right-2 p-2 rounded-lg transition-all duration-200 group">
          <svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" className="w-4 h-4 dark:text-white/60 text-gray-400 group-hover:text-gray-500 dark:group-hover:text-white/60 transition-colors">
            <path d="M14.25 5.25H7.25C6.14543 5.25 5.25 6.14543 5.25 7.25V14.25C5.25 15.3546 6.14543 16.25 7.25 16.25H14.25C15.3546 16.25 16.25 15.3546 16.25 14.25V7.25C16.25 6.14543 15.3546 5.25 14.25 5.25Z" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="1.5" strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round"></path>
            <path d="M2.80103 11.998L1.77203 5.07397C1.61003 3.98097 2.36403 2.96397 3.45603 2.80197L10.38 1.77297C11.313 1.63397 12.19 2.16297 12.528 3.00097" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="1.5" strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round"></path>
          </svg>
          <span className="absolute top-9 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 bg-primary text-white text-xs px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-lg opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 whitespace-nowrap">
            Copy
          </span>
        </button>
        <pre className="p-4 rounded-lg overflow-auto text-xs border dark:border-white/10">
          <code>{JSON.stringify(vercelConfig, null, 2)}</code>
        </pre>
      </div>
    </div>;
};

 `rewrites`  domain

3.  domain
4.  ** domain**
5.  `vercel.json`  `[subdomain]` 

```json  theme={null}
  {
    "rewrites": [
      {
        "source": "/docs",
        "destination": "https://[subdomain].mintlify.dev/docs"
      },
      {
        "source": "/docs/:match*",
        "destination": "https://[subdomain].mintlify.dev/docs/:match*"
      }
    ]
  }
```

* **`source`**:  domain 
* **`destination`**: 
* **`:match*`**: 

 Vercel [ vercel.json Rewrites](https://vercel.com/docs/projects/project-configuration#rewrites)

     branch   branch
  </Step>

     <kbd>/</kbd> 
  </Step>

  </Step>

       branch  PR/Merge Request 
  </Step>

<div id="organize-your-navigation">
  ### 
</div>

 `docs.json`  [Navigation](/zh/organize/navigation)

** Profile  Themes **

 Themes  Profile  `docs.json`  `Profile`  `pages` 

```json title="Adding a Themes page to the Profile group" highlight="18" theme={null}
{
    "navigation": {
        "groups": [
            {
                "group": "",
                "pages": [
                    "index",
                    "quickstart",
                    "installation"
                ]
            },
            {
                "group": "",
                "pages": [
                    "settings",
                    "account-types",
                    "dashboard",
                    "themes"
                ]
            }
        ]
    }
}
```

     **** branch

  <Step title="">
     **Publish Pull Request**PR

    <Frame>

|             | macOS                                            | Windows                                              |
| :------------ | :----------------------------------------------- | :--------------------------------------------------- |
| ****      | <kbd>Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>P</kbd>                    | <kbd>Control</kbd> + <kbd>P</kbd>                    |
| **** | <kbd>Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>K</kbd>                    | <kbd>Control</kbd> + <kbd>K</kbd>                    |
| ****      | <kbd>Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>Enter</kbd>                | <kbd>Control</kbd> + <kbd>Enter</kbd>                |
| ****        | <kbd>Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>B</kbd>                    | <kbd>Control</kbd> + <kbd>B</kbd>                    |
| ****        | <kbd>Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>I</kbd>                    | <kbd>Control</kbd> + <kbd>I</kbd>                    |
| ****       | <kbd>Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>U</kbd>                    | <kbd>Control</kbd> + <kbd>U</kbd>                    |
| ****       | <kbd>Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>S</kbd> | <kbd>Control</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>S</kbd> |
| ****      | <kbd>Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>E</kbd>                    | <kbd>Control</kbd> + <kbd>E</kbd>                    |
| ****        | <kbd>Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>Alt</kbd> + <kbd>0</kbd>   | <kbd>Control</kbd> + <kbd>Alt</kbd> + <kbd>0</kbd>   |
| ** 1**      | <kbd>Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>Alt</kbd> + <kbd>1</kbd>   | <kbd>Control</kbd> + <kbd>Alt</kbd> + <kbd>1</kbd>   |
| ** 2**      | <kbd>Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>Alt</kbd> + <kbd>2</kbd>   | <kbd>Control</kbd> + <kbd>Alt</kbd> + <kbd>2</kbd>   |
| ** 3**      | <kbd>Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>Alt</kbd> + <kbd>3</kbd>   | <kbd>Control</kbd> + <kbd>Alt</kbd> + <kbd>3</kbd>   |
| ** 4**      | <kbd>Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>Alt</kbd> + <kbd>4</kbd>   | <kbd>Control</kbd> + <kbd>Alt</kbd> + <kbd>4</kbd>   |
| ****      | <kbd>Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>7</kbd> | <kbd>Control</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>7</kbd> |

<div id="structure-your-content">
  ## 
</div>



<div id="use-proper-heading-hierarchy">
  ### 
</div>

 H1  frontmatter  `title:`  H2  H4

```mdx  theme={null}
<!--  -->
#  (H1)

##  (H2)

###  (H3)

###  (H3)

##  (H2)

<!--  -->
#  (H1)

##  (H2)

####  (H4)

###  (H3)
```



```mdx  theme={null}
<!--  -->
##  (H2)

###  (H3)

###  (H3)

<!--  -->
##  (H2)

###  (H3)

###  (H3)
```

<div id="write-descriptive-link-text">
  ### 
</div>

    

```mdx  theme={null}
<!-- Good -->
[](/organize/navigation)

<!-- Unclear relation between  -->
[](/organize/navigation)
```

</div>

* 
*

```mdx  theme={null}
|  |  |
| ------- | ------ |
|   |  |
| Analytics |  |
```

<div id="write-effective-alt-text">
  ### alt text
</div>

* ****
* ****
* ****Image of context Screenshot ofDiagram of

```mdx  theme={null}
<!--  -->
![](/images/dashboard.png)

<!--  -->
![](/images/dashboard.png)
```

<div id="add-alt-text-to-images">
  ### alt text
</div>

 Markdown 

```mdx  theme={null}
![](/path/to/image.png)
```

 HTML  `alt` 

```html  theme={null}
<img
  src="/images/screenshot.png"
  alt=""
/>
```

<div id="add-titles-to-embedded-content">
  ### 
</div>

iframe 

```html  theme={null}
<iframe
  src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/example"
  title=""
></iframe>
```

2. n8n  GitHub  webhook
3. n8n  context  API
4. PR

* n8n 
* Mintlify  API key
* Mintlify Pro 
*  GitHub 
* GitHub 

<div id="get-your-admin-api-key">
  ###  API key
</div>

1.  [API keys](https://dashboard.mintlify.com/settings/organization/api-keys) 
2.  **Create Admin API Key**
3.  key 

<div id="get-your-github-personal-access-token">
  ###  GitHub 
</div>

1.  GitHub  **Settings**
2.  **Developer settings**
3.  **Personal access tokens**
4.  **Tokens (classic)**
5.  **Generate new token (classic)**
6. scopes
   * `repo`
   * `admin:repo_hook` n8n  webhooks
7. 

 GitHub [Creating a personal access token (classic)](https://docs.github.com/en/authentication/keeping-your-account-and-data-secure/managing-your-personal-access-tokens?versionId=free-pro-team%40latest\&productId=account-and-profile#creating-a-personal-access-token-classic)

  />

<div id="set-up-the-github-webhook">
  ###  GitHub Webhook
</div>

1.  GitHub 
2.  **Settings**
3.  **Webhooks**
4.  **Add webhook**
5.  Webhook
   * Payload URL n8n Webhook URL
   * Content type`application/json`
   * Which events would you like to trigger this webhook?
     *  **Let me select individual events.**
     *  **Pull requests**
   *  **Active**
6.  **Add webhook**

<div id="filter-for-merged-pull-requests">
  ### PR
</div>

 webhook 

1. 
2. Filter merged PRs.
3.  **Run Once for All Items**
4.  JavaScript

```javascript Filter merged PRs theme={null}
const webhookData = $input.first().json.body;

// PR
if (webhookData.action !== "closed" || webhookData.pull_request?.merged !== true) {
  return [];
}

// 
const pullRequest = webhookData.pull_request;
const repository = webhookData.repository;
const sender = webhookData.sender;

// 
const agentMessage = ` ${repository.name}  **PR #${pullRequest.number}: ${pullRequest.title}** PR`;

return {
  json: {
    prTitle: pullRequest.title,
    prBody: pullRequest.body || "",
    prNumber: pullRequest.number,
    prUrl: pullRequest.html_url,
    prAuthor: sender.login,
    codeRepoName: repository.full_name,
    codeRepoShortName: repository.name,
    branchName: pullRequest.head.ref,
    filesChanged: pullRequest.changed_files,
    agentMessage: agentMessage
  }
};
```

<Frame>
  <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/QZ_aCq18zSx5v43Q/images/guides/n8n/filter-merged-PRs-node.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=QZ_aCq18zSx5v43Q&q=85&s=aa597f537b6916336d78bce53b756eaa" alt=" PR" data-og-width="1520" width="1520" data-og-height="1444" height="1444" data-path="images/guides/n8n/filter-merged-PRs-node.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/QZ_aCq18zSx5v43Q/images/guides/n8n/filter-merged-PRs-node.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=QZ_aCq18zSx5v43Q&q=85&s=6d01ad8b6cfa27608c70b3fe60d30bbf 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/QZ_aCq18zSx5v43Q/images/guides/n8n/filter-merged-PRs-node.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=QZ_aCq18zSx5v43Q&q=85&s=600c81a0c13a8f25eab82db86eefe23a 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/QZ_aCq18zSx5v43Q/images/guides/n8n/filter-merged-PRs-node.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=QZ_aCq18zSx5v43Q&q=85&s=6ecab6f7da79524bba48fffe72aed59a 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/QZ_aCq18zSx5v43Q/images/guides/n8n/filter-merged-PRs-node.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=QZ_aCq18zSx5v43Q&q=85&s=ec461ae90e150ec1825b1c8dc9405a15 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/QZ_aCq18zSx5v43Q/images/guides/n8n/filter-merged-PRs-node.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=QZ_aCq18zSx5v43Q&q=85&s=ecdf518a6503f0652f9d34d687898902 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/QZ_aCq18zSx5v43Q/images/guides/n8n/filter-merged-PRs-node.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=QZ_aCq18zSx5v43Q&q=85&s=4bce5ef97ecf105020ca90a50a4e3172 2500w" />
</Frame>

PR/Merge Request GitHub webhook  API 

<div id="call-the-agent-api">
  ###  agent API
</div>

 HTTP 

1.  HTTP 
2. Create agent job.
3. 

   * `POST`
   * URL: `https://api.mintlify.com/v1/agent/YOUR_PROJECT_ID/job` `YOUR_PROJECT_ID`  ID [API keys](https://dashboard.mintlify.com/settings/organization/api-keys) 
   * Generic Credential Type  Header Auth
     * 
       * `Authorization`
       * `Bearer mint_YOUR_API_KEY` API key
   *  Body
   * Body Content TypeJSON
   *  Body JSON
   *  JSON

   ```json  theme={null}
   {
   "branch": "docs-update-from-{{ $json.codeRepoShortName }}-pr-{{ $json.prNumber }}",
   "messages": [
       {
       "role": "system",
       "content": "{{ $json.agentMessage }}"
       }
   ]
   }
   ```

<Frame>
  <img
    src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/QZ_aCq18zSx5v43Q/images/guides/n8n/create-agent-job-node.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=QZ_aCq18zSx5v43Q&q=85&s=3e167f84f039b95666724424f66abd77"
    alt=" agent "
    style={{
    width: 'auto',
    height: '700px',
  }}
    data-og-width="756"

````mdx wrap theme={null}
## Mintlify 

### docs.json

-  docs.json  [docs.json ](https://mintlify.com/docs.json)

### 

#### Note - 

<Note>

</Note>

#### Tip - 

<Tip>

</Tip>

#### Warning - 

<Warning>

</Warning>

#### Info - 

<Info>

</Info>

#### Check - 

<Check>

</Check>

### 

#### 



```javascript config.js
const apiConfig = {
  baseURL: 'https://api.example.com',
  timeout: 5000,
  headers: {
    'Authorization': `Bearer ${process.env.API_TOKEN}`
  }
};
```

#### 



<CodeGroup>
```javascript Node.js
const response = await fetch('/api/endpoint', {
  headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${apiKey}` }
});
```

```python Python
import requests
response = requests.get('/api/endpoint', 
  headers={'Authorization': f'Bearer {api_key}'})
```

```curl cURL
curl -X GET '/api/endpoint' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY'
```
</CodeGroup>

#### /

/

<RequestExample>
```bash cURL
curl -X POST 'https://api.example.com/users' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{"name": "John Doe", "email": "john@example.com"}'
```
</RequestExample>

<ResponseExample>
```json Success
{
  "id": "user_123",
  "name": "John Doe", 
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z"
}
```
</ResponseExample>

### API 

#### 



<ParamField path="user_id" type="string" required>
 UUID v4 
</ParamField>

<ParamField body="email" type="string" required>

</ParamField>

<ParamField query="limit" type="integer" default="10">
1-100
</ParamField>

<ParamField header="Authorization" type="string" required>
 API  Bearer `Bearer YOUR_API_KEY`
</ParamField>

#### 



<ResponseField name="user_id" type="string" required>

</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="created_at" type="timestamp">
 ISO 8601 
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="permissions" type="array">

</ResponseField>

####

<Expandable title="">
  <ResponseField name="profile" type="object">
  
  
  <Expandable title="">
    <ResponseField name="first_name" type="string">
    
    </ResponseField>
    
    <ResponseField name="avatar_url" type="string | null">
     URL null
    </ResponseField>
  </Expandable>
  </ResponseField>
</Expandable>
````

#  MDX API  OpenAPI 
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/guides/migrating-from-mdx

 API  `MDX`  OpenAPI  API 

 OpenAPI  metadata  content navigation 

<div id="cli-migration">
  ## CLI 
</div>

 `mint migrate-mdx`  MDX 



*  `docs.json` 
*  OpenAPI  MDX 
*  MDX  OpenAPI  `x-mint` 
*  `docs.json` OpenAPI  MDX 
*  MDX 

<Info>
   `x-mint` MDX  MDX  `x-mint` 

   MDX  `docs.json` 

  
</Info>

<Steps>
  <Step title=" OpenAPI ">
     OpenAPI 

     MDX  `openapi:` frontmatter 

    <Tip>
       [Swagger Editor](https://editor.swagger.io/)  [Mint CLI](https://www.npmjs.com/package/mint)  OpenAPI 
    </Tip>
  </Step>

  <Step title=" Mint CLI">
     [Mint CLI](/zh/installation)
  </Step>

  <Step title="">
    ```bash  theme={null}
    mint migrate-mdx
    ```
  </Step>
</Steps>

<div id="manual-migration-steps">
  ## 
</div>

<Steps>
  <Step title=" OpenAPI ">
     OpenAPI 

     metadata  content  `x-mint`  [x-mint extension](/zh/api-playground/openapi-setup#x-mint-extension)

     `x-hidden` 

    <Info>
       [Swagger Editor](https://editor.swagger.io/)  [Mint CLI](https://www.npmjs.com/package/mint)  OpenAPI 
    </Info>
  </Step>

  <Step title="">
     `docs.json`  `MDX`  OpenAPI 

    ```json  theme={null}
    "navigation": {
      "groups": [
        {
          "group": "API Reference",
          "openapi": "/path/to/openapi.json",
          "pages": [
            "overview",
            "authentication",
            "introduction",
            "GET /health",
            "quickstart", 
            "POST /users",
            "GET /users/{id}",
            "advanced-features"
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
    ```
  </Step>

  <Step title=" MDX ">
     `MDX` 
  </Step>
</Steps>

<div id="navigation-patterns">
  ## 
</div>

 API 

<div id="mixed-content-navigation">
  ### 
</div>

 API 

```json  theme={null}
"navigation": {
  "groups": [
    {
      "group": "API ",
      "openapi": "openapi.json",
      "pages": [
        "api/overview",
        "GET /users",
        "POST /users", 
        "api/authentication"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```

<div id="multiple-api-versions">
  ###  API 
</div>

 Tabs  groups  API 

```json  theme={null}
"navigation": {
  "tabs": [
    {
      "tab": "API v1",
      "openapi": "specs/v1.json"
    },
    {
      "tab": "API v2",
      "openapi": "specs/v2.json"
    }
  ]
}
```

      <h3 className="mt-5 text-gray-900 dark:text-zinc-50 font-medium">
        {title}
      </h3>
      <span className="mt-1.5">{description}</span>
    </a>;
};

CLI

CLI  OpenAPI 

<div id="install-the-cli">
  ## CLI
</div>

<Info>
  ****CLI  [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en) v19 
</Info>

<Steps>
  <Step title=" CLI">
     [CLI](https://www.npmjs.com/package/mint)

    <CodeGroup>
      ```bash npm theme={null}
      npm i -g mint
      ```

      ```bash pnpm theme={null}
      pnpm add -g mint
      ```
    </CodeGroup>
  </Step>

  <Step title="">
    `docs.json` 

    ```bash  theme={null}
    mint dev
    ```

     `http://localhost:3000` 
  </Step>
</Steps>

 CLI

```bash  theme={null}
npx mint dev
```

  ##

```bash  theme={null}
mint update
```

  ```bash npm theme={null}
  npm i -g mint@latest
  ```

  ```bash pnpm theme={null}
  pnpm add -g mint@latest
  ```
</CodeGroup>

<div id="troubleshooting">
  ## 
</div>

<AccordionGroup>
  <Accordion title=" darwin-arm64  'sharp' ">
     Node 

    1.  mint CLI`npm uninstall -g mint`
    2.  Node.js
    3.  mint CLI`npm install -g mint`
  </Accordion>

  <Accordion title="">
    **** `~/.mintlify`  `mint dev`
  </Accordion>

  <Accordion title="permission denied">
     Node 

    **** `sudo npm i -g mint`
  </Accordion>

  <Accordion title="">
     CLI 

    \*\*\*\* `mint update` 
  </Accordion>

  <Accordion title="mintlify  mint ">
     CLI  `npm ls -g`

     npm -g  `which mint` 

     `mint`  `mintlify`  `mintlify`

    1. 

    ```bash  theme={null}
      npm uninstall -g mintlify
    ```

    2.  npm 

    ```bash  theme={null}
      npm cache clean --force
    ```

    3. 

    ```bash  theme={null}
    npm i -g mint
    ```
  </Accordion>
</AccordionGroup>

  ##  Analytics
</div>

 `docs.json`  Analytics key Analytics integrations

`docs.json` 

```json Analytics options in docs.json theme={null}
"integrations": {
    "amplitude": {
        "apiKey": ""
    },
    "clearbit": {
        "publicApiKey": ""
    },
    "cookies": {
      "key": "",
      "value": ""
    },
    "fathom": {
        "siteId": ""
    },
    "ga4": {
        "measurementId": ""
    },
    "gtm": {
        "tagId": ""
    },
    "hightouch": {
        "apiKey": "",
        "apiHost": ""
    },
    "hotjar": {
        "hjid": "",
        "hjsv": ""
    },
    "logrocket": {
        "appId": ""
    },
    "mixpanel": {
        "projectToken": ""
    },
    "pirsch": {
        "id": ""
    },
    "plausible": {
        "domain": ""
    },
    "posthog": {
        "apiKey": "",
        "apiHost": ""
    },
    "segment": {
      "key": ""
    },
    "telemetry": {
      "enabled": ""
    }
}
```

 Analytics  `docs.` 

| Event name                              | Description                            |
| :-------------------------------------- | :------------------------------------- |
| `docs.accordion.close`                  |                             |
| `docs.accordion.open`                   |                             |
| `docs.api_playground.request`           |  API  API                  |
| `docs.code_block.copy`                  |                           |
| `docs.code_block.ask_ai`                |  AI                      |
| `docs.content.view`                     |  Analytics  |
| `docs.feedback.thumbs_up`               |                           |
| `docs.feedback.thumbs_down`             |                           |
| `docs.navitem.cta_click`                |                           |
| `docs.expandable.close`                 |                             |
| `docs.expandable.open`                  |                             |
| `docs.navitem.click`                    |                            |
| `docs.footer.powered_by_mintlify_click` | Powered by Mintlify         |
| `docs.assistant.source_click`           |                           |
| `docs.assistant.suggestion_click`       |                           |
| `docs.assistant.thumbs_up`              |                       |
| `docs.assistant.thumbs_down`            |                       |
| `docs.assistant.completed`              |                               |
| `docs.assistant.enter`                  |                               |
| `docs.assistant.shared`                 |                             |
| `docs.search.close`                     |                              |
| `docs.search.result_click`              |                             |
| `docs.context_menu.copy_page`           |  Markdown                 |
| `docs.context_menu.copy_mcp_link`       |  MCP                    |
| `docs.context_menu.ai_provider_click`   |  AI  context  |
| `docs.context_menu.install_mcp_server`  |  MCP               |

  ```json docs.json  Analytics  theme={null}
  "integrations": {
      "pirsch": {
          "id": ""
      }
  }
  ```

  ```json  theme={null}
  "integrations": {
      "pirsch": {
          "id": "8Kw7OKxBfswOjnKGZa7P9Day8JmVYwTp"

  }
  ```

<Info>
   domain  `https://`
</Info>

<CodeGroup>
  ```json docs.json  Analytics  theme={null}
  "integrations": {
      "plausible": {
          "domain": "required",
          "server": "optional"
      }
  }
  ```

  ```json  theme={null}
  "integrations": {
      "plausible": {
          "domain": "docs.domain.com"
      }
  }
  ```
</CodeGroup>

  ```json docs.json  Analytics  theme={null}
      "posthog": {
          "apiKey": "YOUR_POSTHOG_PROJECT_API_KEY",
          "apiHost": "optional"
      }
  }
  ```

  ```json  theme={null}
  "integrations": {
      "posthog": {
          "apiKey": "phc_TXdpocbYTeZVm5VJmMzHTMrCofBQu3e0kN7HGMNGTVW"
      }
  ```

  ```json Integration options in docs.json theme={null}
  "integrations": {
      "osano": "SOURCE"
  }
  ```

  ```json  theme={null}
  "integrations": {
      "osano": "https://cmp.osano.com/2sUB2dqwqdkks/8dqwd-dwd86-4a9b/osano.js"
  }
  ```
</CodeGroup>

`SOURCE`  Osano  `src`  `https://cmp.osano.com/`

```html Code snippet from Osano theme={null}
<script src="https://cmp.osano.com/placeholder/placeholder/osano.js"/>
```

       `.mintlify.app/`  managed rule

<div id="cookie-consent-and-disabling-telemetry">
  ## Cookie /
</div>

 GDPR  Cookie `cookies`  key  value

```json  theme={null}
  "integrations": {
    "cookies": {
      "key": "LOCAL STORAGE KEY",
      "value": "LOCAL STORAGE VALUE"
    }
  }
```

 Cookie/

/ `docs.json` 

```json  theme={null}
  "integrations": {
    "telemetry": {
      "enabled": false
    }
  }
```

<div id="update-your-docsjson-configuration-file">
  ###  `docs.json` 
</div>

 URL  `docs.json`  **Anchors**  **Tabs** 

 `docs.json`  `anchor`  URL 

```json docs.json theme={null}
{
  "anchors": [
    {
      "name": "API ",
      // !mark
      "openapi": "SPEAKEASY_COMBINED_SPEC_URL",
      "url": "api-reference",
      "icon": "square-terminal"
    }
  ]
}
```

 `docs.json`  `tab`  URL 

```json docs.json theme={null}
{
  "tabs": [
    {
      "name": "API ",
      "url": "api-reference",
      // !mark
      "openapi": "SPEAKEASY_COMBINED_SPEC_URL"
    }
  ]
}
```

 Speakeasy  API 


# Stainless
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/integrations/sdks/stainless

 API  SDK 

<div id="prerequisites">
  ## 
</div>

*  [Stainless](https://app.stainless.com) 

<div id="integrate-with-stainless">
  ##  Stainless
</div>

<Steps>
  <Step title=" Stainless  OpenAPI ">
     `stainless.yml`  `openapi.code_samples: 'mintlify'` [Stainless ](https://app.stainless.com/docs/guides/integrate-docs)
  </Step>

  <Step title=" OpenAPI  URL">
     Stainless 

    1.  **Release** 
    2.  **Setup OpenAPI publishing**
    3.  OpenAPI  URL

    <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/stainless-public-OpenAPI-spec.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=8cb501f51ebcf8fde622022cd52771d3" alt="Stainless  OpenAPI  URL" data-og-width="2124" width="2124" data-og-height="1104" height="1104" data-path="images/stainless-public-OpenAPI-spec.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/stainless-public-OpenAPI-spec.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=2808f0ea516aed641d45dfb3cd0c88b2 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/stainless-public-OpenAPI-spec.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=ed8a085f04098f5f2aee20b53e496708 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/stainless-public-OpenAPI-spec.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=4f9faa9dbad67d0ce61affdcaecd2e34 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/stainless-public-OpenAPI-spec.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=b39394c6bc31beba213d0086451ad674 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/stainless-public-OpenAPI-spec.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=18669f3879442b938dcf6450762889b0 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/stainless-public-OpenAPI-spec.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=13ec9d9e6e0e1eaa0ec6cb6397ce9975 2500w" />
  </Step>

  <Step title={<> OpenAPI  URL  <code>docs.json</code></>}>
     `docs.json`  Stainless  URL  `openapi`  [OpenAPI ](/zh/api-playground/openapi-setup)
  </Step>
</Steps>

# SEO
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/optimize/seo

*  HTML

 `docs.json`  frontmatter  `metatags` 

<div id="global-meta-tags">
  ## 
</div>

 `docs.json`  `metatags` 

```json  theme={null}
"seo": {
    "metatags": {
        "og:image": ""
    }
}
```

<div id="set-a-canonical-url">
  ###  URLcanonical URL
</div>

 domain `canonical`  domain URL  URL  SEO

```json  theme={null}
"seo": {
    "metatags": {
        "canonical": "https://www.your-custom-domain-here.com"
    }
}
```

  ##

```mdx  theme={null}
---
title: ""
"og:image": ""
---
```

  ##  meta

</Note>

```json expandable theme={null}
      "music:song": "",
      "music:song:disc": "1",
      "music:song:track": "1",
      "video:actor": "",
      "video:actor:role": "",
      "video:director": "",
      "video:writer": "",
      "video:duration": "120",
      "video:release_date": "2024-01-01",
      "video:tag": "1, 2, 3",
      "video:series": ""
  }
}
```

<div id="sitemaps-and-robotstxt-files">
  ##  robots.txt 
</div>

Mintlify  `sitemap.xml`  `robots.txt` URL  `/sitemap.xml` 

 `docs.json`  `docs.json`  `seo.indexing`

```json  theme={null}
"seo": {
    "indexing": all
}
```

<div id="disabling-indexing">
  ## 
</div>

 [frontmatter](/zh/organize/pages) 

```
---
noindex: true
---
```

 `docs.json`  `metatags.robots`  `"noindex"` `noindex`

```json  theme={null}
"seo": {
    "metatags": {
      "robots": "noindex"
    }
  }
```

<div id="hiding-a-group-of-pages">
  ## 
</div>

 `docs.json`  `hidden`  `true`

```json highlight={4} theme={null}
"groups": [
  {
    "group": "",
    "hidden": true,
    "pages": [
      "index",
      "quickstart"
    ]
  },
  {
    "group": "",
    "pages": [
      "guides/hidden-page.mdx",
      "guides/hidden-groups.mdx"
    ]
  }
]
```

`Getting started`  `Guides`

  ### 
</div>

```json highlight={4} theme={null}
"tabs": [
  {
    "tab": "",
    "hidden": true,
    "pages": [
      "index",
      "quickstart"
    ]
  }
]
```

```json  theme={null}
    "groups": [

        "group": "",
        "icon": "play",
        "expanded": false,
        "pages": [
          "quickstart",
          {
            "group": "",
            "icon": "pencil",
            "pages": [
              "installation",
              "editor"
            ]
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        "group": "",
        "icon": "notebook-text",
        "tag": "NEW",
        "pages": [
          "writing-content/page",
          "writing-content/text"
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

```json  theme={null}
{
  "navigation": {
    "tabs": [
      {
        "tab": "API ",
        "icon": "square-terminal",
        "pages": [
          "api-reference/get",
          "api-reference/post",
          "api-reference/delete"
        ]
      },
      {
        "tab": "SDK",
        "icon": "code",
        "pages": [
          "sdk/fetch",
          "sdk/create",
          "sdk/delete"
        ]
      },
      {
        "tab": "",
        "icon": "newspaper",
        "href": "https://external-link.com/blog"
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

  ###

 `navigation` `menu`  `item`  groupspagesicons

```json  theme={null}
{
  "navigation": {
    "tabs": [
      {
        "tab": "",
        "icon": "square-terminal",
        "menu": [
          {
            "item": "API reference",
            "icon": "rocket",
            "groups": [
              {
                "group": "",
                "icon": "square-terminal",
                "pages": [
                  "api-reference/get",
                  "api-reference/post",
                  "api-reference/delete"
                ]
              }
            ]
          },
          {
            "item": "SDK",
            "icon": "code",
            "description": "SDK  API ",
            "pages": [
              "sdk/fetch",
              "sdk/create",
              "sdk/delete"
            ]
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

```json  theme={null}
{
  "navigation": {
    "anchors": [
      {
        "anchor": "",
        "icon": "book-open",
        "pages": [
          "quickstart",
          "development",
          "navigation"
        ]
      },
      {
        "anchor": "API ",
        "icon": "square-terminal",
        "pages": [
          "api-reference/get",
          "api-reference/post",
          "api-reference/delete"
        ]
      },
      {
        "anchor": "",
        "href": "https://external-link.com/blog"
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

 `global` `global`  `href` 



```json  theme={null}
{
  "navigation": {
    "global":  {
      "anchors": [
        {
          "anchor": "",
          "icon": "house",
          "href": "https://slack.com"
        },
        {
          "anchor": "",
          "icon": "pencil",
          "href": "https://mintlify.com/blog"
        }
      ]
    },
    "tabs": /*...*/
  }
}
```

 `navigation` `dropdowns`  `dropdown`  groupspagesicons

```json  theme={null}
{
  "navigation": {
    "dropdowns": [
      {
        "dropdown": "",
        "icon": "book-open",
        "pages": [
          "quickstart",
          "development",
          "navigation"
        ]
      },
      {
        "dropdown": "API ",
        "icon": "square-terminal",
        "pages": [
          "api-reference/get",
          "api-reference/post",
          "api-reference/delete"
        ]
      },
      {
        "dropdown": "",
        "href": "https://external-link.com/blog"
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

 `navigation` `products`  `product`  groupspagesicons

```json  theme={null}
{
  "navigation": {
    "products": [
      {
        "product": "Core API",
        "description": " API ",    
        "icon": "api",
        "groups": [
          {
            "group": "",
            "pages": [
              "core-api/quickstart",
              "core-api/authentication"
            ]
          },
          {
            "group": "",
            "pages": [
              "core-api/users",
              "core-api/orders"
            ]
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        "product": "Analytics Platform",
        "description": "Analytics ",
        "icon": "chart-bar",
        "pages": [
          "analytics/overview",
          "analytics/dashboard",
          "analytics/reports"
        ]
      },
      {
        "product": "Mobile SDK",
        "description": " SDK ",
        "icon": "smartphone",
        "href": "https://mobile-sdk-docs.example.com"
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

<div id="openapi">
  ## OpenAPI
</div>

 OpenAPI  API  API 

 OpenAPI 

```json  theme={null}
{
  "navigation": {
    "groups": [
      {
        "group": "API ",
        "openapi": "/path/to/openapi-v1.json",
        "pages": [
          "overview",
          "authentication",
          "GET /users",
          "POST /users",
          {
            "group": "",
            "openapi": "/path/to/openapi-v2.json",
            "pages": [
              "GET /products",
              "POST /products"
            ]
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

 OpenAPI [OpenAPI ](/zh/api-playground/openapi-setup)

 `navigation` `versions`  `version` 

```json  theme={null}
{
  "navigation": {
    "versions": [
      {
        "version": "1.0.0",
        "groups": [
          {
            "group": "",
            "pages": ["v1/overview", "v1/quickstart", "v1/development"]
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        "version": "2.0.0",
        "groups": [
          {
            "group": "",
            "pages": ["v2/overview", "v2/quickstart", "v2/development"]
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

```json  theme={null}
}
```

[](mailto:gtm@mintlify.com)

<div id="nesting">
  ## 
</div>



<CodeGroup>
  ```json Anchors theme={null}
  {
    "navigation": {
      "anchors": [
        {
          "anchor": "Anchor 1",
          "groups": [
            {
              "group": "Group 1",
              "pages": [
                "some-folder/file-1",
                "another-folder/file-2",
                "just-a-file"
              ]
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "anchor": "Anchor 2",
          "groups": [
            {
              "group": "Group 2",
              "pages": [
                "some-other-folder/file-1",
                "various-different-folders/file-2",
                "another-file"
              ]
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  }
  ```

  ```json Tabs theme={null}
  {
    "navigation": {
      "tabs": [
        {
          "tab": "Tab 1",
          "groups": [
            {
              "group": "Group 1",
              "pages": [
                "some-folder/file-1",
                "another-folder/file-2",
                "just-a-file"
              ]
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "tab": "Tab 2",
          "groups": [
            {
              "group": "Group 2",
              "pages": [
                "some-other-folder/file-1",
                "various-different-folders/file-2",
                "another-file"
              ]
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  }
  ```

  ```json Tabs with external anchor theme={null}
  {
    "navigation": {
      "global": {
        "anchors": [
          {
            "anchor": "Anchor 1",
            "href": "https://mintlify.com/docs"
          }
        ]
      },
      "tabs": [
        {
          "tab": "Tab 1",
          "groups": [
            {
              "group": "Group 1",
              "pages": [
                "some-folder/file-1",
                "another-folder/file-2",
                "just-a-file"
              ]
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "tab": "Tab 2",
          "groups": [
            {
              "group": "Group 2",
              "pages": [
                "some-other-folder/file-1",
                "various-different-folders/file-2",
                "another-file"
              ]
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  }
  ```
</CodeGroup>

<div id="breadcrumbs">
  ## 
</div>

 `docs.json`  `styling` 

<CodeGroup>
  ```json Display full breadcrumbs theme={null}
  "styling": {
    "eyebrows": "breadcrumbs"
  }
  ```

  ```json Display parent section only theme={null}
  "styling": {
    "eyebrows": "section"
  }
  ```
</CodeGroup>

<div id="interaction-configuration">
  ## 
</div>

 `docs.json`  `interaction` 

<div id="enable-auto-navigation-for-groups">
  ###  groups 
</div>

 `drilldown` 

*  `true`
*  `false`
* 

<CodeGroup>
  ```json  theme={null}
  "interaction": {
    "drilldown": true  // 
  }
  ```

  ```json  theme={null}
  "interaction": {
    "drilldown": false // 
  }
  ```
</CodeGroup>

</ResponseField>

   SEO
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="sidebarTitle" type="string">
  
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="icon" type="string">
   icon

  

  * [Font Awesome icon](https://fontawesome.com/icons) 
  * [Lucide icon](https://lucide.dev/icons) 
  *  URL
  * 
</ResponseField>

  [Font Awesome](https://fontawesome.com/icons)  Font Awesome 

  `regular``solid``light``thin``sharp-solid``duotone``brands`
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="tag" type="string">
  
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="<custom>" type="string">
   YAML frontmatter`product: "API"`  `version: "1.0.0"`
</ResponseField>

```yaml Example YAML frontmatter wrap theme={null}
title: " frontmatter"
description: "Frontmatter  metadata"
sidebarTitle: "Frontmatter"
icon: "book"
tag: "NEW"
---
```

# 
Source: https://mintlify.localhost:3000/zh/organize/settings

 `docs.json` 

`docs.json`  Markdown integrations 

`docs.json` 

<div id="setting-up-your-docsjson">
  ##  `docs.json`
</div>

 `theme``name``colors.primary`  `navigation`

 `docs.json`  schema 

```json  theme={null}
{
  "$schema": "https://mintlify.com/docs.json",
  "theme": "mint",
  "name": "",
  "colors": {
    "primary": "#ff0000"
  },
  "navigation": {
    // 
  }
  // 
}
```

<div id="reference">
  ## 
</div>

 `docs.json` 

<div id="customization">
  ### 
</div>

<ResponseField name="theme" required>
  

  `mint``maple``palm``willow``linden``almond``aspen`

  [](/zh/customize/themes)
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="name" type="string" required>
  
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="colors" type="object" required>
  

  <Expandable title="Colors">
    <ResponseField name="primary" type="string matching ^#([a-fA-F0-9]{6}|[a-fA-F0-9]{3})$" required>
      

       `#` 
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="light" type="string matching ^#([a-fA-F0-9]{6}|[a-fA-F0-9]{3})$">
      

       `#` 
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="dark" type="string matching ^#([a-fA-F0-9]{6}|[a-fA-F0-9]{3})$">
      

       `#` 
    </ResponseField>
  </Expandable>
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="description" type="string">
   SEO AI 
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="logo" type="string or object">
   logo

  <Expandable title="Logo">
    <ResponseField name="light" type="string" required>
       logo `/logo.png`
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="dark" type="string" required>
       logo `/logo-dark.png`
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="href" type="string (uri)">
       logo  URLlogo `https://mintlify.com`
    </ResponseField>
  </Expandable>
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="favicon" type="string or object">
   favicon  favicon `/favicon.png`

  <Expandable title="Favicon">

       favicon `/favicon.png`
    </ResponseField>

       favicon `/favicon-dark.png`

    </ResponseField>

      ****

      * `"system"`
      * `"dark"`

      ```json  theme={null}
      }
      ```

      `x``website``facebook``youtube``discord``slack``github``linkedin``instagram``hacker-news``medium``telegram``twitter``x-twitter``earth-americas``bluesky``threads``reddit``podcast`
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="links" type="array of object">
      

      <Expandable title="Links">
        <ResponseField name="header" type="string">
          

          1
        </ResponseField>

        <ResponseField name="items" type="array of object" required>
          

          <Expandable title="Items">
            <ResponseField name="label" type="string" required>
              

              1
            </ResponseField>

            <ResponseField name="href" type="string (uri)" required>
               URL
            </ResponseField>
          </Expandable>
        </ResponseField>
      </Expandable>
    </ResponseField>
  </Expandable>
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="banner" type="object">
  

  <Expandable title="Banner">
    <ResponseField name="content" type="string">
       Markdown 

      ```json  theme={null}
      {
        "content": " Banner is live! [Learn more](mintlify.com)"
      }
      ```
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="dismissible" type="boolean">
       `false`
    </ResponseField>
  </Expandable>
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="redirects" type="array of object">
  

  <Expandable title="Redirects">
    <ResponseField name="source" type="string" required>
      `/old-page`
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="destination" type="string" required>
      `/new-page`
    </ResponseField>

    <ResponseField name="permanent" type="boolean">
      301 `true`
    </ResponseField>
  </Expandable>
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="contextual" type="object">
   AI 

  <Expandable title="Contextual">
    <ResponseField name="options" type="array of &#x22;copy&#x22; | &#x22;view&#x22; | &#x22;chatgpt&#x22; | &#x22;claude&#x22; | &#x22;perplexity&#x22; | &#x22;mcp&#x22; | &#x22;cursor&#x22; | &#x22;vscode&#x22;" required>
      

      * `copy` Markdown 
      * `view` Markdown 
      * `chatgpt` ChatGPT
      * `claude` Claude
      * `perplexity` Perplexity
      * `mcp` MCP  URL 
      * `cursor` Cursor  MCP 
      * `vscode` VSCode  MCP 

      <img src="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/page-context-menu.png?fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=5175084ae9522835d6aa31405a926a3e" alt="" className="rounded-xl" data-og-width="1348" width="1348" data-og-height="824" height="824" data-path="images/page-context-menu.png" data-optimize="true" data-opv="3" srcset="https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/page-context-menu.png?w=280&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=42b197fc0a31987821be2208e1e34f1b 280w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/page-context-menu.png?w=560&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=0726bdf2cb2eec4aacdd9ab9c0eceef2 560w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/page-context-menu.png?w=840&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=bc9d15acfa2d916494a50b7ddee600a0 840w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/page-context-menu.png?w=1100&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=9f6aff964fa8c802640e3fc7fdff3d06 1100w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/page-context-menu.png?w=1650&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=917ababf5dee7290b466503aeef2844c 1650w, https://dev.mintcdn.com/mintlify/mvenohBb7F5T71_N/images/page-context-menu.png?w=2500&fit=max&auto=format&n=mvenohBb7F5T71_N&q=85&s=9f69676a1926b42ef4c4126f4e15cfc5 2500w" />

    </ResponseField>
  </Expandable>
</ResponseField>

    ```json docs.json lines wrap theme={null}
      },
      "errors": {
        "404": {
          "redirect": false,
          "title": "",
          "description": "__****"
        }
      }
    }
    ```
  </Tab>
</Tabs>

<div id="upgrading-from-mintjson">
  ##  `mint.json` 
</div>

 `mint.json`  `docs.json`

<Steps>
  <Step title="CLI">
    [CLI](/zh/installation)

    <CodeGroup>
      ```bash npm theme={null}
      npm i -g mint
      ```

      ```bash yarn theme={null}
      yarn global add mint
      ```

      ```bash pnpm theme={null}
      pnpm add -g mint
      ```
    </CodeGroup>

     CLI

    ```bash  theme={null}
    mint update
    ```
  </Step>

  <Step title=" docs.json ">
    

    ```bash  theme={null}
    mint upgrade
    ```

     `mint.json`  `docs.json` 
  </Step>

  <Step title=" mint.json ">
     `docs.json`  `mint.json` 
  </Step>
</Steps>

 `index.mdx`

<div id="adding-a-custom-domain">
  ## 
</div>

 `<your-project-name>.mintlify.app` 

 [Domain Setup](https://dashboard.mintlify.com/settings/deployment/custom-domain)

 domain `docs.yourcompany.com` DNS

<Table>
  |   |         |                     | TTL  |
  | ----- | --------- | -------------------- | ---- |
  | CNAME | docs | cname.vercel-dns.com | 3600 |
</Table>

<Info>
  DNS  48 
</Info>
